skill.name: an unarmed attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when not wielding a weapon in the primary hand.

skill.name: a melee attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding only a single one-handed weapon.

skill.name: a melee attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when wielding a one-handed weapon with a shield.

skill.name: a melee attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when dual-wielding one-handed weapons.

skill.name: a melee attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when wielding a two-handed weapon.

skill.name: a ranged attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when wielding a bow.

skill.name: a ranged attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when wielding a crossbow.

skill.name: Flashing Blades
skill.description:
After using Double-edged Strike, make a pair of powerful attacks against your enemies.
<rgb=#FFFF00> Dual-wielding required.</rgb>

skill.name: Exposed Throat
skill.description:
After using Double-edged Strike, make a harmful attack.
Chance to stun an enemy for 6s to enable a Fellowship Manoeuvre for your group.

skill.name: Ents go to War
skill.description:
Shakes the earth as if an Ent stamped his foot, damaging and stunning several enemies.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Eagle-friend
skill.description:
Summons an eagle companion.
The eagle is a noble creature which can deal damage and, if called upon, will sacrifice itself to save you.

skill.name: Beak Rend
skill.description: This skill deals damage to some of the enemies and returns that as morale to the Eagle.

skill.name: Sacrifice
skill.description: This skill will cause the Eagle to bring his master back from the brink of defeat. This skill only functions if the Eagle is in combat.

skill.name: Fan the Flames
skill.description:
This skill takes advantage of an enemy who is under Burning Embers and hurts them grievously by stirring up the flames causing them to run in panic.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Fear replaced with attack speed debuff.</rgb>

skill.name: Bard's Arrow
skill.description:
A shot that strikes the enemy with fear.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Fear replaced with attack speed debuff.</rgb>

skill.name: Press Onward
skill.description: Quickly heals a great deal of Morale and grants a short movement buff when out of combat.

skill.name: Rain of Thorns
skill.description:
Rains thorn arrows down upon your enemies, allowing you to pin multiple targets.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Root replaced with a mount acceleration debuff.</rgb>

skill.name: Rally!
skill.description: Revives a defeated ally in combat, with their Health and Power mostly intact.

skill.name: Symphony of the Hopeful Heart
skill.description:
Increases Hope and Incoming Healing in a 5m area for 2m 30s.
Furthermore, if an ally remains within the area for a few seconds, they will receive a buff to Resistance and Avoidance Penetration when they exit the area.

skill.name: Cry of the Wizards
skill.description: Call upon a powerful song to blast your enemies with an area-of-effect of light that will slow the creatures who are hit by it.

skill.name: Shield of the Dúnedain
skill.description: Spend a considerable amount of your power to shield an ally for a time.

skill.name: Oathbreaker's Shame
skill.description: Increases the damage you and your companions deal to the foe.

skill.name: In Defence of Middle-earth
skill.description: Your very presence inspires those around you to perform better in combat.

skill.name: Ferocious Strikes
skill.description:
Makes three deadly attacks.
This attack can only be evaded; it will never miss, be parried by or blocked by an on level opponent.

skill.name: Ferocious Strikes
skill.description:
Makes three deadly attacks.
This attack can only be evaded; it will never miss, be parried by or blocked by an on level opponent.

skill.name: Fight On
skill.description: Heals the Champion for a percentage of their health over time.

skill.name: Raging Blade
skill.description:
Makes a full AoE attack, inflicting heavy damage.
This attack never misses on level opponents.

skill.name: Raging Blade
skill.description:
Makes a full AoE attack, inflicting heavy damage.
This attack never misses on level opponents.

skill.name: Controlled Burn
skill.description:
Briefly increases damage, Power regen, and attack speed.
Adds 1 Fervour Pip every 5 seconds.

skill.name: To the King
skill.description:
A powerful attack against a foe providing a chance to knock targets down.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires the use of Thrust or Overwhelm.</rgb>

skill.name: Shield-smash
skill.description:
Strike a hard blow with your shield.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires the use of Bash.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Guardian's Threat
skill.description: This stance focuses on enraging your enemies.

skill.name: Challenge the Darkness
skill.description: You know how to goad your enemies into attacking you, making you their most threatening opponent, as well as raising your Guardian's Ward.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of Victory
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Victory into battle. This banner reduces power costs of those around it.

skill.name: Coordinated Attack
skill.description: Your Herald has a chance to stun the target with a melee attack. Additionally, your Herald will do 50% more damage if they are behind the target.

skill.name: Infuriating Tactics
skill.description: Your Herald will taunt the target with a melee attack.

skill.name: Escape from Darkness
skill.description: Revives a defeated ally (in-combat).

skill.name: Rallying Cry
skill.description:
Boosts Morale of nearby Fellows.
This skill is more potent when used with a Defeat Event.

skill.name: Routing Cry
skill.description:
Deals Light damage to nearby foes.
This skill is more potent when used with a Defeat Event.

skill.name: Battle-shout
skill.description: An attack that triggers a Battle-readied State, enabling you to deal more damage.

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of War
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of War into battle. This banner increases the damage dealt by those around it.

effect.name: Call to Arms: Herald of War

skill.name: Muster Courage
skill.description: Removes Poison, Disease, Wound or Fear effects from nearby allies.

effect.name: Remove One Fear, Poison, Disease, or Wound

skill.name: Call to Arms: Herald of Hope
skill.description: You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Hope into battle. This banner increases the mitigations of those around it.

skill.name: Devastating Blow
skill.description:
A very damaging melee attack with increased critical damage.
Requires Battle-readied State.
Using this skill enables the Battle-hardened state, boosting healing and defences.
Critical attacks deal greater damage and trigger a Defeat Response.

skill.name: Threatening Shout
skill.description: A shout that draws threat, forcing the enemy to attack you.

skill.name: Swift Strike
skill.description: A swift melee attack.

skill.name: Battle Frenzy
skill.description: Your Fervour is instantly increased as well as some additional fervour over time.

skill.name: Dire Need
skill.description: Costs 30% of your current power but greatly restores your morale.

skill.name: Sting
skill.description: A quick stinging blow.

skill.name: Shield-swipe
skill.description:
Attack with both weapon and shield.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a block response.</rgb>

skill.name: Guardian's Ward
skill.description: Strengthens defences briefly.

skill.name: Shield-blow
skill.description: A strike with your shield that will open a block response.

skill.name: Catch a Breath
skill.description:
You are able to catch your breath to restore morale and power.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a block or parry response.</rgb>

skill.name: Vexing Blow
skill.description: A quick swipe that will strike multiple enemies.

skill.name: Challenge
skill.description: Draws enemy threat away from your allies.

skill.name: Protection by the Sword
skill.description: Boosts damage of your Fellowship. Enables you to react to an attack blocked or parried by an ally if within 10m.

skill.name: Guardian's Pledge
skill.description: Strengthens defences briefly.

skill.name: Warrior's Heart
skill.description: Briefly boosts max Morale.

skill.name: Thrill of Danger
skill.description: Regenerates Power, increasing with every enemy near you. (This skill works in combat only.)

skill.name: Set Trap
skill.description:
Places a trap to root the enemy.
Trap remains for 60 seconds after being placed.

skill.name: Intent Concentration
skill.description: In a desperate time, instantly reach full Focus.

skill.name: Beneath Notice
skill.description: Reduces threat.

skill.name: Staff-strike
skill.description: Strikes hard with the staff. If your pet is flanking the enemy, you will deal bonus damage.

skill.name: Improved Staff-strike
skill.description:
Strikes hard with the staff, dealing Light damage with a chance to stun.
If your pet is flanking the enemy, you will deal bonus damage.

skill.name: Power of Knowledge
skill.description: Lightning wreaths your enemy while restoring your own power.

skill.name: Light of Hope
skill.description: Transfers Morale to an ally or companion.

skill.name: Knowledge of Cures
skill.description: Cleanse multiple wounds, diseases, poisons, or fears from an ally.

effect.name: DNT - Remove Poison, Disease, Wound, or Fear

skill.name: Sign of the Wild: Rage
skill.description: This sign asks your animal friend to go into a rage, attacking faster and making itself look as threatening as possible. You cannot have more than one Sign of the Wild active on your companion at a time without the trait 'Master of Beasts'.

skill.name: Cracked Earth
skill.description:
Unstable earth deals Fire damage to several enemies, eventually rooting them in place.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Root replaced with a mount acceleration debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Wisdom of the Council
skill.description:
Heals Morale in a time of need.
Briefly protects you, while damaging enemies who attack you.

skill.name: Blinding Flash
skill.description:
A flash instantly dazes the enemy, but damage will break its stupor.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Share the Power
skill.description: Transfers Power to an ally or companion.

skill.name: Greater Anthem II - War
skill.description:
Anthem: Increases Ranged and Tactical Damage of all nearby fellowship or raid members.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 2 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb>

skill.name: Cry of the Valar
skill.description: Call upon a song to blast your enemies with an area-of-effect of light. This attack will also remove a Corruption buff from the enemies you hit.

skill.name: Song of Aid
skill.description: Bring relief to your fellowship. Applies a short, potent Heal to your fellows and deflects some Incoming Damage back at their attackers.

skill.name: Improved Song of Aid
skill.description:
Inspires Fellows to perform heroic feats, and the effects last longer and recover more quickly.
Burglar: Gains a Critical Response.
Captain: Gains an Enemy Defeat Response.
Champion: Gains an Enemy Defeat Response.
Guardian: Gains a Block Response and a Parry Response.
Hunter: Gains a Parry Response.
Lore-master: Beacon of Hope has a decreased Cooldown and Morale cost.
Minstrel: Unlocks Bolster Courage for free and Dissonance Calls.
Rune-keeper: Scribe's Spark and Prelude to Hope have decreased Cooldowns.
Warden: Shield Piercer has a decreased Cooldown.

skill.name: Minor Ballad
skill.description:
Boosts Tactical damage and harms your foe.
Ballads unlock Anthems and Codas.

skill.name: Enlivening Grace
skill.description: Revives a defeated ally.

skill.name: Cry of the Chorus (Melody)
skill.description: This skill provides you with three power ballad bonus effects allowing access to Anthems and Codas. It also breaks any silence effects on you.

skill.name: Subtle Stab
skill.description: A quick, sharp attack against your foe.

skill.name: Riddle
skill.description:
Daze the enemy briefly, waking the foe when damage is dealt.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Aim
skill.description:
Careful aim results in a Critical Hit and reduced miss chance on the next damaging attack.
Using this skill will not break Stealth.
This skill guarantees a Critical Response

skill.name: Trick: Dust in the Eyes
skill.description:
Blind the enemy, causing them to miss often.
Limit: One Trick per target.

skill.name: Diversion
skill.description:
Divert the enemy's attention briefly from yourself while in Stealth.
Does not break Stealth.

skill.name: Trick: Disable
skill.description:
Strike to slow the foe's attacks.
Limit: One Trick per target.

skill.name: Trick: Counter Defence
skill.description:
Strike to lower the enemy's defences.
Limit: One Trick per target.

skill.name: Hide in Plain Sight
skill.description:
Disappear from before the enemy's eyes.
Briefly improves Stealth. Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Sneak
skill.description:
Move about unseen while Sneaking.
There is a chance enemies will detect you, especially when you move in front of them.

skill.name: Trick: Enrage
skill.description:
Cause the enemy to take more damage and prevent them from using most ranged attacks.
Limit: One Trick per target.

skill.name: Track Mines
skill.description: When active, nearby ore deposits are displayed on the radar.

skill.name: Track Wood
skill.description: When active, nearby tree branches are displayed on the radar.

skill.name: Track Crops
skill.description: When active, nearby crops are displayed on the radar.

skill.name: Wild Attack
skill.description: A single powerful melee attack.

skill.name: Blade Wall
skill.description: Makes a frontal AoE attack.

skill.name: Savage Strikes
skill.description: Makes a savage double attack.

skill.name: Brutal Strikes
skill.description: Makes three deadly attacks that are difficult to parry or evade.

skill.name: Exchange of Blows
skill.description: You reflect damage to your attacker when hit.

skill.name: Blade Storm
skill.description: Makes a full AoE attack.

skill.name: Bracing Attack
skill.description: You make an attack which allows you to brace yourself against counterattack, increasing your Morale by a small amount.

skill.name: Sudden Defence
skill.description:
Gain a protective morale shield defending you against incoming damage.
Bubble strength is 35% of the targets' Max Morale pool before other bonuses apply.

skill.name: Champion's Challenge
skill.description: Your taunting cry forces your target to face and attack you for a few seconds.

skill.name: Merciful Strike
skill.description: A powerful attack that can only be used on opponents under 20% health.

skill.name: Battle Acuity
skill.description: You make a cunning attack that catches your opponents off-guard. Your area-of-effect attacks will deal more damage for a short time.

skill.name: Sprint
skill.description:
Increases movement speed.
Grants immunity to movement speed debuffs.

skill.name: Clobber
skill.description: Makes a swift melee attack, interrupting any induction skills being attempted by the enemy.

skill.name: Horn of Gondor
skill.description:
Makes a full AoE attack, which stuns your opponents.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Hamstring
skill.description: Makes an attack which snares your opponent.

skill.name: Hedge
skill.description: You make a melee attack, securing your weapons and altering your fighting position to make greater use of your armour and attempting to secure yourself from wounds.

skill.name: Stallion's Spirit
skill.description: This fellowship skill replenishes your power and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Ent's Strength (Melee)
skill.description: This fellowship skill does direct melee damage to your target and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Eagle's Cry
skill.description: This fellowship skill replenishes your morale and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Spider's Guile (Melee)
skill.description: This fellowship skill does minor direct melee damage to your target, then more damage over time and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Let Fly
skill.description: You attack with your ranged weapon.

skill.name: Boast
skill.description: Tales of your heroic acts draw cheers from the crowd.

skill.name: Cutting Attack
skill.description: A bleed that deals damage-over-time.

skill.name: Telling Mark
skill.description:
Mark an enemy so that allies can do increased damage to it.
You may only mark one target at a time.

skill.name: Make Haste
skill.description: Increases the movement speed of the Fellowship.

skill.name: Noble Mark
skill.description:
Mark an enemy, causing their strikes to empower you or your allies.
You may only mark one target at a time.

skill.name: Pressing Attack
skill.description:
An AoE double-strike inflicting moderate damage.
Requires Battle-readied State.
Using this skill enables the Battle-hardened state, boosting healing and defences.
Critical hits trigger a Defeat Response.

skill.name: Words of Courage
skill.description: Restores an ally's morale over time.

skill.name: Motivating Speech
skill.description: Boosts Morale of nearby allies.

skill.name: Last Stand
skill.description: You are able to resist succumbing to defeat for a short time.

skill.name: Revealing Mark
skill.description:
Mark an enemy so that allies can gain health when they attack it.
You may only mark one target at a time.

skill.name: Cry of Vengeance
skill.description: Revives up to two defeated allies and inspires nearby Fellows to greatness.

skill.name: In Harm's Way
skill.description: You put yourself in harm's way to defend your nearby companions, taking half of all damage dealt to them upon yourself.

skill.name: Command Respect
skill.description: Your presence commands respect from those around you.

skill.name: Dissonant Strike
skill.description: A damaging melee attack that increases the potency of incoming healing.

skill.name: Raise the Spirit
skill.description: Quickly heals Morale of an ally or yourself.

skill.name: Major Ballad - Resonance
skill.description:
Heals a small area around your target while boosting your healing capability.
Ballads unlock Anthems and Codas while in combat.
<rgb=#00ffDD>While in Dissonance and Melody this skill will deal damage to a target instead of healing.</rgb>

skill.name: Piercing Cry
skill.description: Your shout does light damage to your enemies and can interrupt their actions.

skill.name: Perfect Ballad
skill.description:
Heals you and harms your foe.
Ballads unlock Anthems and Codas.

skill.name: Greater Anthem III - Prowess
skill.description:
Anthem: Increases Melee Damage Attack Speed, and Orc-craft and Fell-wrought Mitigation of all nearby fellowship or raid members.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 2 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb>

skill.name: Lesser Anthem III - Composure
skill.description:
Anthem: Increases Resistances, Tactical Mitigation, and Shadow, Acid, and Fire Mitigation of all nearby fellowship or raid members.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 1 ballad buff present on the Minstrel.</rgb>

skill.name: Inspire Fellows
skill.description:
Heals the Morale of the Fellowship.
This skill is not usable in Dissonance.

skill.name: Invocation of Elbereth
skill.description:
Calling upon the Valar can send certain evil foes fleeing in terror for a short time.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Fear replaced with attack speed debuff.</rgb>

skill.name: Bolster Courage
skill.description: Significantly heals Morale of an ally or yourself.

skill.name: Song of Restoration
skill.description: A song that makes an ally's heart glad again, removing some of the evil that currently plagues it.

effect.name: DNT - Remove Poison, Disease, Wound, or Fear

skill.name: Story of Courage
skill.description:
Removes one Poison, Fear, Disease, or Wound from nearby fellows.
Protects against further Fears.

skill.name: Triumphant Spirit
skill.description: In desperate times, instantly heals the Morale of the Fellowship.

skill.name: Song of Distraction
skill.description: A song that can make your enemy become drowsy and not detect players until they are much closer than normal. This does not work against monsters already engaged in combat.

skill.name: Still As Death
skill.description: You are talented at feigning death, causing enemies to ignore you completely.

skill.name: Story of the Hammerhand
skill.description:
A story so potent that it provides you with a shield of morale that must be destroyed before you will begin losing morale again. The name comes from the adage that those who know this story were said to have been able to take a blow from Helm Hammerhand himself.
Bubble strength is 35% of your Max Morale pool before other bonuses apply.

skill.name: Burning Embers
skill.description: Burn the enemy with damage-over-time, slowing movement.

skill.name: Raven-lore
skill.description:
Summons a raven companion.
The raven specializes in buffing and debuffing.

skill.name: Inner Flame
skill.description:
Use Power to heal Morale for both yourself and your companion. Inner Flame tiers up a damage buff over several seconds.
Must have a companion summoned.

skill.name: Gust of Wind
skill.description:
Tearing winds cause frost damage to 5 enemies in a 5m radius.
<rgb=#2C86FF>When traited in Nature's Fury, this skill has a chance to make Burning Embers burn hotter and spread to nearby foes.</rgb>

effect.name: DNT - Gust of Wind Damage AoE

skill.name: Friend of Bears
skill.description:
Summons a bear companion.
Bears are tough companions which can draw the ire of the enemy.

skill.name: Test of Will
skill.description:
Damages and stuns the target.
This skill has a large bonus to its Critical chance and magnitude.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Sign of Power: Command
skill.description: Slows enemy attack speed and reduces Parry chance.

skill.name: Sign of Power: Righteousness
skill.description: Renders an ally immune to stuns, dazes, and other combat states for 20s. This duration cannot be increased by any source.

skill.name: Sign of Power: Vigilance
skill.description: Allows you to better see hidden enemies.

skill.name: Fire-lore
skill.description: Debuffs enemies' physical attack damage.

skill.name: Wind-lore
skill.description: Increases enemies' incoming damage.

skill.name: Herb-lore
skill.description:
Roots several enemies in place.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Root replaced with a mount acceleration debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Call to the Valar
skill.description: You call upon the wisdom of the Valar, recovering some of your skills and providing a temporary immunity to induction set back from damage.

skill.name: Light of the Rising Dawn
skill.description:
Damages and stuns the enemy.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Sweeping Cut
skill.description: A sweeping back-and forth strike in a frontal arc.

skill.name: Guardian's Defence
skill.description: This stance focuses your defences on blocking attacks.

skill.name: Retaliation
skill.description:
A retaliation after parrying an attack.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a parry response.</rgb>

skill.name: Bash
skill.description:
Bash with your shield to stun the target. This skill has a higher chance to perform a critical hit.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires the use of Shield-swipe.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Overwhelm
skill.description:
Deal a powerful attack that will also increase a Deep Wound into a Terrible Wound.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires the use of Breach or Whirling Breach.</rgb>

skill.name: Whirling Retaliation
skill.description:
Whirl to attack enemies in a circle.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a parry response.</rgb>

skill.name: Thrust
skill.description:
Deal a thrusting blow to open a Deep Wound.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires the use of Breach, or Whirling Breach.</rgb>

skill.name: Shield-taunt
skill.description:
Laugh at your enemies after bashing them with your Shield-swipe, taunting them. This skill draws the enemy's attention to yourself.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires the use of Shield-swipe.</rgb>

skill.name: Stamp
skill.description: Interrupts the target.

skill.name: Turn the Tables
skill.description: When dazed, stunned, or knocked down: recover from impairing effects and inflict them upon your enemy instead.

skill.name: Guardian's Promise
skill.description: Makes a whistle to give to a friend, for summoning you to their side.

skill.name: Trip
skill.description: While Stealthed, stun an enemy to enable a Fellowship Manoeuvre for your group.

skill.name: Surprise Strike
skill.description:
Strike the enemy, dealing more damage from behind or when Stealthed.
Critical hits with Surprise Strike are more damaging than most skills.

skill.name: Cunning Attack
skill.description:
Deals damage even after the initial strike.
The bleed deals more damage while Stealthed.

skill.name: Provoke
skill.description:
Deals slight damage and grants you the Provacateur buff, greatly reducing damage from the next hit you take and improves your crit chance by 20% on your next attack.
Does more damage if used from in Stealth.

skill.name: Gambler's Advantage
skill.description:
A Critical hit enables the Burglar to strike, applying a tiering bleed to the target.
Deals extra damage when attacking from behind.

skill.name: Double-edged Strike
skill.description:
A Critical hit enables the Burglar to strike with both weapons.
<rgb=#FFFF00>Dual-wielding required.</rgb>

skill.name: Exploit Opening
skill.description: Stun an enemy to enable a Fellowship Manoeuvre for your group.

skill.name: Addle
skill.description: Causes the enemy to fail skill attempts, and subsequent skill attempts will briefly take longer to execute.

skill.name: Mischievous Glee
skill.description:
Restore your Morale by removing an active Trick from the foe.
This skill will never miss against on-level targets, nor can it be parried, blocked, or evaded.

skill.name: Reveal Weakness
skill.description:
Weaken enemy defences, increasing damage taken from attacks.
Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Ready and Able
skill.description:
Resets the recovery timers on several skills.
Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Touch and Go
skill.description:
Heal yourself and improve your defences.
Using this skill will not break Stealth.

skill.name: Find Footing
skill.description:
Quickly recover from being dazed, stunned, or knocked down.
Using this skill will not break Stealth.

effect.name: Exits Daze, Fear, Stun, Conjunction Stun, Knockdown and Knockout combat states.

skill.name: Track Treasure
skill.description: Tracks treasure chests and valuable containers.

skill.name: Burgle
skill.description: While stealthed, you may attempt to lighten the pockets of unsuspecting targets.

skill.name: Cure Poison
skill.description: Cures poison on an ally.

skill.name: Quick Shot
skill.description: Nock and loose an arrow quickly.

skill.name: Barbed Arrow
skill.description: Your arrow can cause a wound that bleeds and slightly slows movement speed.

skill.name: Swift Bow
skill.description: Loose two missiles in rapid succession.

skill.name: Penetrating Shot
skill.description: A damaging shot that pierces enemy mitigations.

skill.name: Rain of Arrows
skill.description: Rains arrows down upon your enemies, allowing you to hit multiple targets.

skill.name: Merciful Shot
skill.description:
A massively damaging shot that unlocks when the target is below 50% health.
Critical hits deal bonus damage.

skill.name: Low Cut
skill.description: A low cut in front of you which briefly slows the movement speed of up to 2 enemies.

skill.name: Scourging Blow
skill.description:
A melee attack dealing additional damage if the enemy suffers from Barbed Arrow.
Using this skill will stop the bleeding.

skill.name: Blindside
skill.description: A swift ranged attack that can interrupt an enemy's actions.

skill.name: Find the Path
skill.description:
Increases your movement speed, also affecting nearby allies.
Movement speed only increased while out of combat.

skill.name: Purge Poison
skill.description: Purges poisons from an ally or yourself.

effect.name: Remove Fear, Poison, Disease, or Wound

skill.name: Bright Camp-fire
skill.description:
Build a camp-fire to quicken allies' recovery.
Enables some crafting skills.
Camp-fire lasts for 3 minutes.

skill.name: Desperate Flight
skill.description: Escape from danger and travel to a nearby rally point.

effect.name: Hunter Travel to Nearest Rally Point

skill.name: Guide to Thorin's Hall
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Thorin's Hall.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Guide to Bree
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Bree.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Guide to Esteldín
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Esteldín.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Guide to Rivendell
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Rivendell.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Passage of Nature
skill.description: Allows you to track the presence of nearby beasts and other natural creatures.

skill.name: Passage of Foes
skill.description: Allows you to track the presence of nearby Orcs, trolls, giants, and evil Men or dwarves.

skill.name: Passage of Shadow
skill.description: Allows you to track the presence of the dead, the unseen, and ancient evil.

skill.name: Camouflage
skill.description: Enter Stealth while remaining still.

skill.name: Ent's Strength (Ranged)
skill.description: This fellowship skill does direct ranged damage to your target and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Spider's Guile (Ranged)
skill.description: This fellowship skill does minor direct ranged damage to your target, then more damage over time and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.

skill.name: Focus
skill.description:
Before combat, rapidly increase your Focus.
Focus is required to use some bow skills and is lost if you move.

skill.name: Stance: Precision
skill.description:
When active, generates Focus every 5 seconds.
Quick Shot has increased Critical Chance.
Upon activation, grants a finesse buff for a short duration.

skill.name: Stance: Strength
skill.description:
When active, increases damage of shots.
Quick Shot slows enemy movement speed.

skill.name: Stance: Endurance
skill.description:
When active, decreases the Power cost of Ranged attacks and increases your Parry and Evade ratings.
Quick Shot returns morale.
Upon activation, grants an Evade chance bonus.

skill.name: Guile Melee Pair
skill.description: Guile Melee Pair

skill.name: Guile Ranged Pair
skill.description: Guile Ranged Pair

skill.name: Guile Contribution
skill.description: Guile Contribution

skill.name: Guile Contribution
skill.description: Guile Contribution

skill.name: Guile Melee Triplet
skill.description: Guile Melee Triplet

skill.name: Guile Ranged Triplet
skill.description: Guile Ranged Triplet

skill.name: Guile Melee Quad
skill.description: Guile Melee Quad

skill.name: Guile Ranged Quad
skill.description: Guile Ranged Quad

skill.name: Tactics Pair
skill.description: Tactics Pair

skill.name: Tactics Contribution
skill.description: Tactics Contribution

skill.name: Tactics Triplet
skill.description: Tactics Triplet

skill.name: Tactics Quad
skill.description: Tactics Quad

skill.name: Strength Pair
skill.description: Strength Pair

skill.name: Strength Pair
skill.description: Strength Pair

skill.name: Strength Contribution
skill.description: Strength Contribution

skill.name: Strength Triplet
skill.description: Strength Triplet

skill.name: Strength Quad
skill.description: Strength Quad

skill.name: Conviction Pair
skill.description: Conviction Pair

skill.name: Conviction Contribution
skill.description: Conviction Contribution

skill.name: Conviction Triplet
skill.description: Conviction Triplet

skill.name: Conviction Quad
skill.description: Conviction Quad

skill.name: Strength Quad
skill.description: Strength Quad

skill.name: Strength Triplet
skill.description: Strength Triplet

skill.name: Strength Quintuplet
skill.description: Strength Quintuplet

skill.name: Strength Quintuplet
skill.description: Strength Quintuplet

skill.name: Guile Melee Quintuplet
skill.description: Guile Melee Quintuplet

skill.name: Guile Ranged Quintuplet
skill.description: Guile Ranged Quintuplet

skill.name: Tactics Quituplet
skill.description: Tactics Quituplet

skill.name: Conviction Quintuplet
skill.description: Conviction Quintuplet

skill.name: Strength Sextuplet
skill.description: Strength Sextuplet

skill.name: Strength Sextuplet
skill.description: Strength Sextuplet

skill.name: Guile Melee Sextuplet
skill.description: Guile Melee Sextuplet

skill.name: Guile Ranged Sextuplet
skill.description: Guile Ranged Sextuplet

skill.name: Tactics Sextuplet
skill.description: Tactics Sextuplet

skill.name: Conviction Sextuplet
skill.description: Conviction Sextuplet

skill.name: Resilience
skill.description: You are hardier than most and can recover from most crowd control effects.

skill.name: Disarm
skill.description: With a flash of steel you render your target unable to use their weapons for a short while. This skill can only be used against players.

skill.name: Hamstring
skill.description: You cut the legs of your foe, slowing their movement.

skill.name: Clinging Webs
skill.description:
You spray your target with clinging, sticky webs, reducing their chance to hit you.<rgb=#00ff00>
Applies Ensnared Effect. Stacks 3 times. </rgb>

skill.name: Lie In Wait
skill.description: When not in combat, you can hide beneath the ground, unseen by foes, until you burst from the ground.

skill.name: Set Trap
skill.description: You carefully place a snare on the ground to trap your foes.

skill.name: Death Blossom
skill.description: You release several arrows in quick succession hitting multiple foes around your target.

skill.name: Flaming Arrow
skill.description: A fire tipped arrow which will continue to burn the target after landing.

skill.name: Snap Out of It!
skill.description: You can shout at an ally who is dazed, stunned, rooted, or knocked down and they will begin to recover.

skill.name: Mobilise
skill.description: You compel your allies to hasten their movement for a brief time.

skill.name: Quit Whining and Fight!
skill.description: You exhort and deride your allies, restoring some of their health. Heals all allies within radius.

skill.name: Rallying Howl
skill.description:
When you defeat an enemy, you can howl to heal yourself and your fellows over time.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a Defeat Response</rgb>

skill.name: Disappear
skill.description:
From beneath the very nose of your foe, you can disappear and prowl unseen once more. For a short while your stealth is extremely effective.<rgb=#FF7700>
In Flayer, Disappear becomes Topple. Topple: Knocks your target to the ground. </rgb>

skill.name: Stealth
skill.description:
You can prowl beneath the notice of all but the keenest eyes, waiting to strike.
<rgb=#FF7700>In Flayer: Brute Increases the application chance of your brute bonuses.</rgb>

skill.name: Wild Attack
skill.description: A powerful melee attack, followed by a quick off-hand swipe.

skill.name: Blade Wall
skill.description: Makes a frontal AoE attack.

skill.name: Savage Strikes
skill.description: Makes a pair of savage attacks, followed by a quick off-hand swipe.

skill.name: Brutal Strikes
skill.description: Makes three deadly attacks that are difficult to parry or evade.

skill.name: Blade Storm
skill.description: Makes a full AoE attack.

skill.name: Bracing Attack
skill.description: You make an attack which allows you to brace yourself against counterattack, increasing your Morale by a small amount.

skill.name: Resonant Piercing Cry
skill.description: Your shout does light damage to your enemies and can interrupt their actions.

skill.name: Benediction of the Raven
skill.description: This skill makes the target more vulnerable to fire.

skill.name: Distraction
skill.description: This channeled skill debuffs archers' damage by denying them the ability to fire.

skill.name: Evasion
skill.description: This self buff protects the raven from shadow and melee attacks.

skill.name: Improved Friend of Bears
skill.description:
Summons a bear companion.
Bears are tough companions which can draw the ire of the enemy.

skill.name: Roaring Challenge
skill.description: This skill forces the target to attack the bear.

skill.name: Shatter Arms
skill.description: This skill applies an armour debuff.

skill.name: Bear Hug
skill.description: This skill stuns the opposition.

skill.name: Brutal Slash
skill.description: This skill is a brutal attack.

skill.name: Tangle-foot
skill.description:
While Stealthed, stun an enemy to enable a Fellowship Manoeuvre for your group.
Does not break Stealth.

skill.name: Stealthed Surprise Strike
skill.description:
Strike the enemy, dealing more damage from behind or when Stealthed.
Critical hits with Surprise Strike are more damaging than most skills.

skill.name: Stealthed Cunning Attack
skill.description:
Deals damage even after the initial strike.
The bleed deals more damage while Stealthed.

skill.name: Stealthed Provoke
skill.description:
Deals slight damage and grants you the Provacateur buff, greatly reducing damage from the next hit you take and improves your crit chance by 20% on your next attack.
Does more damage if used from in Stealth.

skill.name: Quick Shot: Flaming Arrow
skill.description:
Nock and loose an arrow quickly.
Arrows inflict fire damage.

skill.name: Quick Shot: Elvish Arrow
skill.description:
Nock and loose an arrow quickly.
Arrows inflict Light damage.

skill.name: Burning Arrow
skill.description: Your oil-soaked arrow sets your enemy aflame and causes it to burn and slightly slows movement speed.

skill.name: Eldarin Arrow
skill.description: Through your knowledge of Elvish or dwarf-virtues, your arrow causes light damage over time and slightly slows movement speed.

skill.name: Swift Bow: Ablaze
skill.description:
Loose two missiles in rapid succession.
Arrows inflict fire damage.

skill.name: Swift Bow: Star-light
skill.description:
Loose two missiles in rapid succession.
Arrows inflict Light damage.

skill.name: Penetrating Shot: Burn Through
skill.description:
A damaging shot that pierces enemy mitigations.
Arrows inflict fire damage.

skill.name: Penetrating Shot: Pierce the Darkness
skill.description:
A damaging shot that pierces enemy mitigations.
Arrows inflict Light damage.

skill.name: Rain of Arrows: Fire-storm
skill.description:
Rains arrows down upon your enemies, allowing you to hit multiple targets.
Arrows inflict fire damage.

skill.name: Rain of Arrows: Light From The Sky
skill.description:
Rains arrows down upon your enemies, allowing you to hit multiple targets.
Arrows inflict Light damage.

skill.name: Low Cut
skill.description: A low cut in front of you which briefly slows the movement speed of up to 3 enemies.

skill.name: Scourging Blow
skill.description:
A melee attack dealing additional damage if the enemy suffers from Barbed Arrow.
Using this skill will stop the bleeding.

skill.name: Throw Stone
skill.description: This grants you a short ranged attack.

skill.name: Return to the Shire
skill.description: Your skill as a hobbit allows you to find a path back to The Shire. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Hobbit-resilience
skill.description: You can raise your Fellowship's Hope value through good old-fashioned hobbit-cheer. This does not stack with other Hope buffs.

skill.name: Hobbit-stealth
skill.description: Although untrained, you have the natural ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.

skill.name: Hobbit-silence
skill.description: You can lie prone in complete silence, causing enemies to ignore you.

skill.name: Upper-cut
skill.description: You make a stiff punch at your enemy.

skill.name: Return to Bree
skill.description: This enables you to quickly return to Bree. This skill is easily interrupted.

effect.name: Race of Man Travel to Bree

skill.name: Duty-bound
skill.description: You provide a bonus to your Fellowship's Morale.

skill.name: Strength of Morale
skill.description: In combat, the Race of Man is known for its unquenchable spirit. This skill restores lost morale.

skill.name: Silvan Shadows
skill.description: Although untrained, you have the natural ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.

skill.name: Return to Rivendell
skill.description: This enables you to quickly return to Rivendell. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Eldar's Grace
skill.description: With the speed and grace of the Eldar, you can put up a strong parry defence.

skill.name: Power of the Eldar
skill.description: You provide a bonus to your Fellowship's Power.

skill.name: Head-butt
skill.description: Allows you to smash an enemy with your head for damage.

skill.name: Return to Thorin's Gate
skill.description: This enables you to quickly return to Thorin's Gate. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Endurance of Stone
skill.description: For a short amount of time, you can withstand blows that would batter a weaker race's Morale into dust.

skill.name: Dwarf-endurance
skill.description: You provide a bonus to your Fellowship's Vitality.

skill.name: Sudden Strikes
skill.description: Two fast attacks on your target.

skill.name: Jagged Cut
skill.description: A sweeping cut that can damage multiple targets in front of you.

skill.name: Sundering Blow
skill.description: A destructive attack, weakening the target's armour.

skill.name: Devastating Strike
skill.description: When your target has less than 50% of their morale, you can make an extremely damaging attack with an increased chance to critical.

skill.name: Blinding Dust
skill.description: You throw dust into the air around, blinding nearby foes.

skill.name: Glory in Future Victory
skill.description:
The sight of your opponents falling before you catapults you into an empowering rage, giving you bursts of healing and increasing damage dealt and taken.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a Defeat Response</rgb>

skill.name: Default Melee Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when dual-wielding one-handed weapons.

skill.name: Strong Pull
skill.description: You pull on your bow and loose an arrow.

skill.name: Screaming Shafts
skill.description: You loose several arrows, carved and crafted to howl as they fly through the air.

skill.name: Punctured Target
skill.description:
A sharpened arrow that can pierce armour.
<rgb=#00ff00>Ignores 30% of your target's mitigations</rgb>

skill.name: Hindering Shot
skill.description: A shaft aimed to slow the movement of your quarry.

skill.name: Cut
skill.description: A sweeping cut that can damage multiple targets in front of you.

skill.name: Moving Target
skill.description: You can better evade the attacks of your foes for a short period of time.

skill.name: Default Melee Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding only a single one-handed weapon.

skill.name: Intimidating Shout
skill.description: A ferocious and terrifying battle roar to weaken the certainty and morale of your foe.

skill.name: Cleave
skill.description: You swing your weapon at your foe.

skill.name: Crack The Whip
skill.description: Your blistering derision shames your target to higher health.

skill.name: On Your Feet!
skill.description: You bellow a harsh command, enabling up to 5 nearby and defeated allies to rise, albeit at very low health.

skill.name: Field Promotion
skill.description: You single out an ally to support and protect them in the midst of battle.

skill.name: Aura of Command
skill.description: When the fight has begun, your commanding aura allows your allies to fight more viciously.

skill.name: Default Melee Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding a one-handed weapon with a shield.

skill.name: Piercing Attack
skill.description:
An attack with your sharp talons deals damage and causes the target to bleed.
<rgb=#00ff00>Ignores 50% of your target's mitigations.</rgb>

skill.name: Tainted Kiss
skill.description: A ranged attack which flings a painful contact poison at the target causing damage over time.

skill.name: Latent Poison
skill.description: A bite injecting a poison which weakens the target and can stun them if not cured.

skill.name: Snaring Web
skill.description:
A ranged attack that targets the victim's legs with sticky webs, rooting them in place.<rgb=#00ff00>
Applies Ensnared Effect. Stacks 3 times.</rgb>

skill.name: Entangling Web
skill.description:
You can cover your target's arms with sticky webbing, slowing their attacks.<rgb=#00ff00>
Applies Ensnared Effect. Stacks 3 times. </rgb>

skill.name: Poison Spray
skill.description: You can spit a crippling poison in a spray, hitting enemies in front of you up to a short distance away.

skill.name: Trapdoor Sanctuary
skill.description: You can burrow into the ground becoming invulnerable and hidden for a limited time.

skill.name: Claws
skill.description:
You attack with your sharp and piercing claws. <rgb=#FF7700>
In Flayer: Raking Claws Adds a bleed effect. Brute bonus: Interupts targets inductions
In Shadow: Bestial Claw Deals more damage than Claws and has a much greater chance to critically hit. </rgb>
<rgb=#00FFDD>Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

skill.name: Pounce
skill.description:
You leap at your target to distract it, interrupting actions it was performing.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

skill.name: Savage Fangs
skill.description:
You rip at your target's flesh, tearing muscle and slowing his attacks. If the target was suffering from your crippling bite he begins taking damage over time. <rgb=#FF7700>
In Flayer: Brutal Fangs Reduces Evade rating. Brute bonus: Reduces armour rating.
In Shadow: Shadow Fangs Increases induction time and reduces parry rating. </rgb>

skill.name: Crippling Bite
skill.description: A sharp snap of your jaws and your target's movement is slowed.

skill.name: Throat Rip
skill.description:
You sink your teeth in and rip, and your target is silenced.
<rgb=#FF7700> In Flayer:Muscle Tear Decreases target movement speed and increases attack duration. </rgb>

skill.name: Sprint
skill.description: A sudden burst of speed for catching prey, or to avoid becoming it.

skill.name: Sudden Pounce
skill.description:
Unseen till the last moment, you leap at your target and knock it down to the ground.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

skill.name: Swing Away
skill.description: Send your friends away!

skill.name: Fellowship's Heart
skill.description:
Provides a Heal-over-time to the Fellowship and removes Fear effects.
Allies in range will become immune to Fear effect for 10s.

skill.name: Default Ranged Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding a bow.

skill.name: Fire (Rank 4)
skill.description: A basic ranged weapon attack.

skill.name: Default Melee Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding a two-handed weapon.

skill.name: Cleave (Rank 4)
skill.description: An attack that makes up for a lack of elegance with brutal effectiveness.

skill.name: Slice (Rank 3)
skill.description: A sweeping cut that can damage multiple targets in front of the attacker.

skill.name: Rend (Rank 1)
skill.description: Two quick attacks on your target.

skill.name: Slash (Rank 2)
skill.description: A basic, but effective cutting attack.

skill.name: Thrust (Rank 3)
skill.description: A directed, piercing attack.

skill.name: Seeking Blade
skill.description: Increases the chance that you will critical on Relentless and Remorseless Strikes.

skill.name: Chicken Hit
skill.description: Send the chicken flying.

skill.name: Default Ranged Attack
skill.description: Ranged auto-attack for Spider Weaver.

skill.name: Unarmed Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when attacking with single unarmed attacks.

skill.name: Unarmed Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when dual-unarmed attacking.

skill.name: Ebbing Ire
skill.description: Reduces threat generated by the Champion.

skill.name: Lesser Persistence
skill.description: Large increase to armour for a short time.

skill.name: Inspire (Shield-brother)
skill.description: A melee attack that heals the Morale of your Shield-brother.

skill.name: 1H Weapon Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding only a single one-handed weapon.

skill.name: Bow Attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding a bow.

skill.name: Stealth
skill.description: A scattered people, the Rangers of the North are skilled at becoming unseen when they wish it.

skill.name: Misdirection
skill.description: Although not capable of being invisible in the spirit world, Rangers are still known for disappearing from sight. For a short while your stealth is extremely effective.

skill.name: Dúnadan's Strike
skill.description: A Ranger is both master of blade and bow. This attack will knock down the opponent.

skill.name: Blood of the Dúnedain
skill.description: Strength of morale can be called from the line of Elros even still in this dark time. This will restore morale to the Ranger.

skill.name: Dúnedain Mark
skill.description: When marked as a prey of one of the Dúnedain, their wrath is terrible.

skill.name: Fly True
skill.description: A potent ranged attack that causes devastating damage on critical hit. It will never miss against on-level creatures.

skill.name: Return to Camp
skill.description:
Binds you to one of many camp-sites scattered across the world.
Binding enables you to return to the camp-site with ease.

skill.name: Guide to Ost Guruth
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Ost Guruth in the Lone-lands.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Guide to Michel Delving
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Michel Delving in the Shire.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Guide to Evendim
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Evendim.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Guide to West Angmar
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to West Angmar.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Guide to East Angmar
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to East Angmar.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Dagger Throw
skill.description: This well-thrown knife will root an in-bound target.

skill.name: Righteousness Arrow
skill.description: These arrows will make the servant of the Eye burn.

skill.name: Heart Seeker
skill.description: A shot that cannot be missed, parried, evaded, or blocked.

skill.name: Strength of the Earth
skill.description: Quickly recover Power in combat.

skill.name: Crush
skill.description: Crush little annoying things. Sometimes, stun them. Sometimes, make them hurt long time.

skill.name: Swat
skill.description: Swat the whiny little things so they fly away. Sometimes, they run slow after.

skill.name: Rock
skill.description: Throw rock at far away things. Hurt things near far thing. Sometimes, make things bleed after.

skill.name: 1H Weapon Attack
skill.description: Quick 1h club auto-attack

skill.name: Throw Rock
skill.description: Quick-ish stone from the ground attack

skill.name: Smash
skill.description: Hit small things twice. Sometimes, make things hit back slow.

skill.name: Stomp
skill.description: Bring foot up, put foot down, puny things fall over. Sometimes, things get hurt easier after.

skill.name: Thud
skill.description: Pick up rock. Drop rock. Sometimes, hurt little things extra lots.

skill.name: Rampage
skill.description: Get angry. Hit harder. Hit faster.

skill.name: Roar
skill.description: Roar of rage. When is sometimes? Sometimes is next.

skill.name: Draw Attention
skill.description: This skill draws the attention of nearby monsters to the Hunter's Lure trap.

skill.name: Piercing Trap
skill.description:
Places a snare to slow the enemy and cause damage over time.
Trap remains for 60 seconds after being placed.

skill.name: To Arms (Shield-brother)
skill.description: Briefly increases the defence of your Shield-brother.

skill.name: Kick
skill.description: A melee attack that interrupts enemy inductions.

skill.name: Withdraw
skill.description: Breaks the effects of Dazes, Stuns and Knockdowns.

effect.name: Exits Daze, Fear, Stun, Conjunction Stun, Knockdown and Knockout combat states.

skill.name: Time of Need
skill.description:
You gain a surge of energy for a short time.
Puts you in a Battle-readied State.
Increases your damage output for a short time.

effect.name: DNT - Captain Defeat Event Skill Combo

skill.name: Blade of Elendil
skill.description:
An attack that does Light damage with an increased Critical chance.
Requires Battle-hardened State.
Fellows within range gain the Light of Elendil, enabling them to deal additional Light damage.
This attack never misses and cannot be blocked, parried or evaded.

skill.name: Track Artifacts
skill.description: When active, nearby artifacts are displayed on the radar.

skill.name: Peck
skill.description: You peck at something with your beak.

skill.name: Bob and Weave
skill.description: Sometimes survival comes down to not being hit. Actually, most times.

skill.name: Seek The Worm
skill.description: Nothing can escape your searching gaze. So long as it is a worm.

skill.name: Fowl Fleetness
skill.description: A burst of speed can make the difference between freedom and flattened.

skill.name: Possum Impersonation
skill.description: Middle-earth is a dangerous place. Sometimes it is good to be dead.

skill.name: Troll's Brutality (Melee)
skill.description: This warband skill does direct melee damage to your target and can contribute to warband manoeuvres.

skill.name: Paranoia
skill.description: You're not sure what, but something isn't right.

skill.name: Bane Flare
skill.description: A flare in the sky dazes the enemy, but damage will break its stupor.

skill.name: Improved Warding Knowledge
skill.description:
Creates a circle in which enemies are vulnerable to tactical damage and more likely to miss.
Circle remains for 1 minute.
Affects the following: Dead, Unseen, Creatures of Nature, and Insects.

skill.name: Advanced Warding Knowledge
skill.description:
Creates a circle in which enemies are vulnerable to tactical damage and more likely to miss.
Circle remains for 1 minute.
Affects the following: Dead, Unseen, Creatures of Nature, Insects, and Drakes.

skill.name: Warding Knowledge
skill.description: Creates a circle in which enemies are vulnerable to tactical damage and more likely to miss.

skill.name: Ancient Craft
skill.description:
Debuffs enemies' armour value with a handful of thrown metal.
If the Ancient Craft trait is at third rank or higher, enemies will take extra damage from Lightning skills.

skill.name: Sticky Tar
skill.description:
Smashes a phial of sticky tar onto the ground.
Slows movement speed of enemies who run through tar, and makes them vulnerable to fire.
Tar remains for 1 minute.

skill.name: Storm-lore
skill.description:
A thunder-clap stuns surrounding enemies briefly, inflicting weak damage.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: The Melody of Battle
skill.description:
This melody inspires you or your target to better know the fluid nature of battle, providing them swift blades and manoeuvres that dishearten their foes. When traited in The Protector of Song, it will also occasionally increase threat generation.
<rgb=#00FFDD>This skill is only available in Resonance.</rgb>

skill.name: Timeless Echoes of Battle
skill.description:
This powerful chant recalls great deeds done in battle by the mighty Valar when the world was young, demoralizing your foes.
<rgb=#00FFDD>This skill must target an enemy and is only usable in Dissonance.</rgb>

skill.name: Dissonance - Stance
skill.description:
Your charismatic speech drives fear into the hearts of your enemies.
<rgb=#FF7700>You lose access to all fellowship heals and all normal heals become Self-only.
Echoes of Battle becomes Timeless Echoes of Battle.
Major Ballad becomes an offensive Ballad.
Coda of Vigour becomes Coda of Fury.</rgb>
Only one Stance may be active at a time.

skill.name: Call of Oromë
skill.description:
Requires Dissonance Stance.
Deals AoE Light damage and reduces Light damage resistance.

skill.name: Call of the Second Age
skill.description:
Deals a burst of AoE Light damage to nearby foes.
Boosts movement speed of nearby allies.

skill.name: Call to Greatness
skill.description:
You call out to your fellows, inspiring them to Greatness and resetting the cooldown of key skills. This is a raid-wide effect.
Beorning: Thickened Hide, Call to Wild, and Nature's Bond
Brawler: Come At Me and Battle Fury
Burglar: All In, Coup de Grace, and Trickster
Captain: Shield of the Dúnedain, Oathbreaker's Shame, and At the Fore
Champion: Unbreakable, Champion's Duel, and Great Cleave
Guardian: Juggernaut, Hammer Down, and Cataclysmic Shout
Hunter: Rapid Fire, Burn Hot, and The One Trap
Lore-master: Murder of Crows, Nature's Fury, and Ancient Master
Mariner: Guided By the Stars, Fore with Haste, and Steady Traveller
Minstrel: Legend of Helm Hammerhand and Cry of the Wizards
Rune-keeper: Essay of Exaltation, Combustion, and Concession and Rebuttal
Warden: For the Free Peoples, Recklessness, and Javelin of Deadly Force
<rgb=#00FFDD>You may only receive this effect once every 2 minutes.</rgb>

skill.name: Gift of the Hammerhand
skill.description:
Grants a Morale bubble to a Fellowship member.
Bubble strength is 20% of the target's Max Morale pool before other bonuses apply.

skill.name: Lightning-storm
skill.description:
Vicious lightning strikes at the enemy.
<rgb=#2C86FF>This skill can cash-out Burning Embers for bonus damage.</rgb>

skill.name: Fell Spirit's Terror (Ranged)
skill.description: This warband skill does direct ranged damage to your target, then transfers morale to you from your target and can contribute to warband manoeuvres.

skill.name: Conviction Pair
skill.description: Conviction Pair

skill.name: Conviction Sextuplet
skill.description: Conviction Sextuplet

skill.name: Guile Contribution
skill.description: Guile Contribution

skill.name: Guile Contribution
skill.description: Guile Contribution

skill.description: Guile Ranged Triplet

skill.description: Guile Ranged Quintuplet

skill.name: Spider's Venom (Melee)
skill.description: This warband skill does direct melee damage to your target, then morale over time and can contribute to warband manoeuvres.

skill.name: Conviction Triplet
skill.description: Conviction Triplet

skill.name: Conviction Quintuplet
skill.description: Conviction Quintuplet

skill.name: Troll's Brutality (Ranged)
skill.description: This warband skill does direct ranged damage to your target and can contribute to warband manoeuvres.

skill.description: Strength Pair

skill.name: Wight's Rot (Melee)
skill.description: This warband skill does direct melee damage to your target, then transfers power to you from your target and can contribute to warband manoeuvres.

skill.name: Strength Quintuplet
skill.description: Strength Quintuplet

skill.name: Wight's Rot (Ranged)
skill.description: This warband skill does direct ranged damage to your target, then transfers power to you from your target and can contribute to warband manoeuvres.

skill.name: Tactics Quad
skill.description: Tactics Quad

skill.description: Guile Ranged Sextuplet
