skill.name: Battle Memory
skill.description:
This allows a Warden to store a gambit for later, letting them use it without having to build it.
<rgb=#00FFDD>This skill requires the Potency effect. Potency is triggered by the improved versions of Defensive Strike, Deft Strike and Goad. Once potent, the next Gambit used will replace Battle Memory.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>Potency is consumed and replaced by a potent version of your next successfully executed Gambit.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Cost: % of Max Morale Equal to the Number of Icons used to build Gambit</rgb>

skill.name: Surety of Death
skill.description:
A resolute strike, dealing strong Light Damage over time.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Onslaught
skill.description:
Multiple fast attacks, dealing direct damage.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Safeguard
skill.description:
A quick strike, which damages the enemy and heals you over time.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Adroit Manoeuvre
skill.description:
A strike that lets the Warden attack more quickly for a time.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: The Boot
skill.description:
A powerful kick which interrupts inductions.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Impressive Flourish
skill.description:
Ready your weapon, increasing your ability to parry.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Fierce Resolve
skill.description:
Drains morale from nearby enemies over time to heal the Warden.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Restoration
skill.description:
A masterful skill which applies a powerful heal-over-time effect.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Celebration of Skill
skill.description:
An impressive movement that restores a significant amount of morale.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Precise Blow
skill.description:
A quick attack which deals Light Damage over time.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Reversal
skill.description:
An attack which removes one corruption from the enemy.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Brink of Victory
skill.description:
A potent attack dealing Light Damage to a group of enemies in front of the Warden.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Wall of Steel
skill.description:
A weaving pattern of weapon attacks, dealing strong direct damage.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Power Attack
skill.description:
A powerful weapon blow which deals damage over time.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Conviction
skill.description:
Boosts your defences and heals nearby allies.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: The Dark Before Dawn
skill.description:
A Gambit which restores Power and grants some Power-over-Time.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Dance of War
skill.description:
A manoeuvre designed to evade enemy blows.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Boar's Rush
skill.description:
A fast shield rush deals significant damage to enemies in front of you.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Warden's Triumph
skill.description:
A triumphant blow, allowing the Warden to deal even more damage.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Resolution
skill.description:
Even in the face of overwhelming numbers, your resolution dismays your foes, draining morale from enemies around you and restoring your morale.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Piercing Strike
skill.description:
A piercing attack which deals Light Damage over time.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Desolation
skill.description:
Let out a deafening cry, striking terror into the enemies before you and dealing strong Light Damage over time.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Spear of Virtue
skill.description:
A forward thrust which deals strong Light Damage over time.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Unerring Strike
skill.description:
A targeted strike that is very difficult to avoid and deals potent damage for a long time.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Persevere
skill.description:
A shield strike, which heals you over time and increases incoming healing.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Mighty Blow
skill.description:
A mighty blow that is difficult to avoid and deals damage over time.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Shield Mastery
skill.description:
Masterful shield movements increase your defences.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Offensive Strike
skill.description:
A swift double attack.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Maddening Strike
skill.description:
A furious shield attack unbalances your enemy, increasing your ability to evade.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Exultation of Battle
skill.description:
Wardens find strength in the sure knowledge that they are fighting to defend the defenceless. Drains significant morale from nearby enemies over time to heal the Warden.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: War-cry
skill.description:
A shout which deals Light Damage to a group of enemies around the Warden.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Combination Strike
skill.description:
An aggressive dual weapon strike.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Wizard's Fire
skill.description:
A basic sigil which burns your foe over a brief time.
If this skill is used whilst your companion flanks the enemy, your Power will be restored and your fire will burn hotter for a time.

skill.name: Challenge
skill.description: Draws enemy threat away from your allies.

skill.name: Improved Sign of Power: Command
skill.description: Slows enemy attack speed and reduces Parry chance.

skill.name: Improved Turn the Tables
skill.description: When dazed, stunned, knocked down, or knocked out you may turn the tables on your enemy, recovering from the effects and instilling them in your enemy. This attack can not be Blocked, Parried, Evaded or Miss an on level opponent.

skill.name: Improved Staff-sweep
skill.description:
Sweeps the staff to strike surrounding foes.
For each enemy hit, you receive a buff to Crit Chance for your next Fire Skill.

skill.name: Improved Staff-sweep
skill.description:
Sweeps the staff to strike surrounding foes.
For each enemy hit, you receive a buff to Crit Chance for your next Fire Skill.

skill.name: Improved Sign of the Wild: Rage
skill.description:
Enables animal companion to attack faster, deal more damage, and draw threat.
Only one Sign of the Wild may be active without the trait: Master of Beasts.

effect.name: Improved Sign of the Wild: Rage

skill.name: Improved Burning Embers
skill.description:
Burn the enemy with damage-over-time, slowing movement.
The damage-over-time can now tier up on your target.

skill.name: Shield Tactics
skill.description:
Impressive shield movements increase defences.
<rgb=#00FFDD>This Gambit grants immunity to stuns.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Shield Tactics
skill.description:
Impressive shield movements increase defences.
<rgb=#00FFDD>This Gambit grants immunity to stuns.</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Sure Strike
skill.description:
A melee attack that cannot be blocked or parried.
Reduces the active cooldown of Battle-shout.

skill.name: Grave Wound
skill.description:
A powerful strike that damages your foe and deals damage-over-time to the target.
This skill is more difficult for your enemies to avoid.

skill.name: Song-brother
skill.description: A toggle marking an ally as your Song-brother, making them the target of some of your abilities.

skill.name: Inspire (Blade-brother)
skill.description: A melee attack that restores a small amount of Power to your Blade-brother and increases their damage slightly.

skill.name: To Arms (Blade-brother)
skill.description: Briefly increases the offence of your Blade-brother.

skill.name: Blade-brother
skill.description:
A toggle marking an ally as your Blade-brother, making them the target of some of your abilities.
This skill will prevent the use of Stand Alone while active.

skill.name: To Arms (Song-brother)
skill.description: Briefly increases the healing capability of your Song-brother.

skill.name: Inspire (Song-brother)
skill.description: A melee attack that restores Power to your Song-brother.

mount.name: Fleet-footed Goat
mount.sourceDescription: Available in the LOTRO Store!
mount.description: This is a fleet-footed goat capable of achieving speeds as great as truly fast horses.

mount.name: Fleet-footed Goat
mount.sourceDescription: Available in the LOTRO Store!
mount.description: This is a fleet-footed goat capable of achieving speeds as great as truly fast horses.

skill.name: Improved Cutting Attack
skill.description: A bleed that deals damage-over-time and slows movement speed.

skill.name: Improved Seeking Blade
skill.description: Your next Relentless or Remorseless Strike will critically strike your foe, if used within 10 seconds. After this, your chance to critically hit with Relentless and Remorseless Strikes will increase for 10s.

skill.name: Improved Punctured Target
skill.description:
A sharpened arrow that can pierce armour. On hit, reduces the active cooldown of Vital Target.
<rgb=#00ff00>Ignores 30% of your target's mitigations</rgb>

skill.name: Elendil's Roar
skill.description: A shout that draws threat, forcing multiple enemies to attack you.

skill.name: Resuscitate
skill.description: You patch your ally's wounds, assisting them in recovering from defeat.

skill.name: Improved Sudden Strikes
skill.description: Two fast attacks on your target.

skill.name: True Heroics
skill.description: Restores the power of your Fellows and decreases your attack duration while forcing all surrounding enemies to attack you.

skill.name: True Heroics
skill.description: Restores the power of your Fellows and increases your critical chance while increasing the attack duration of all enemies around you.

skill.name: True Heroics
skill.description: Restores the power of your Fellows and increases your melee damage while slowing all enemies around you.

skill.name: Split Shot
skill.description:
Looses multiple arrows at once, hitting several targets in a small area.
Split shot is treated as an Induction Skill.

skill.name: Coda of Resonance
skill.description:
A Finishing Skill that heals the target.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 3 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Ballads from the Minstrel.</rgb>

skill.name: Coda of Melody
skill.description:
A Finishing Skill that deals enormous AoE damage to foes and AoE healing to allies.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 3 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Ballads from the Minstrel.</rgb>

skill.name: Coda of Fury
skill.description:
A Finishing Skill that deals enormous damage to the target and restores some of your power.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 3 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Ballads from the Minstrel.</rgb>

skill.name: Resonance - Stance
skill.description:
A healing stance, wherein the Minstrel's restorative abilities are at their finest.<rgb=#FF7700>
Major Ballad becomes a healing Ballad.
Echoes of Battle Becomes The Melody of Battle.
Coda of Melody becomes Coda of Resonance.</rgb>
Only one Stance may be active at a time.

skill.name: Anthem of the Third Age - Melody
skill.description:
Anthem: Increases damage and incoming healing of your fellowship.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 3 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ff00>Alters Coda: Coda will reapply Anthem of the Third Age (Melody) on a critical hit.</rgb>

effect.name: Anthem of the Third Age - Melody
DNT - Anthem of the Third Age - Melody

skill.name: Bolster Courage
skill.description: Significantly heals Morale (self-targetted).

skill.name: Echoes of Battle
skill.description:
This chant recalls great deeds done in battle, demoralizing your foe.
<rgb=#00FFDD>This skill must target an enemy and is only usable in Melody.</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Penetrating Shot
skill.description: A damaging shot that pierces enemy mitigations.

skill.name: Imp. Quick Shot: Flaming Arrow
skill.description:
Nock and loose an arrow quickly.
Has a chance to generate additional Focus.
Arrows inflict fire damage.

skill.name: Imp. Penetrating Shot: Pierce the Darkness
skill.description:
A damaging shot that pierces enemy mitigations.
Arrows inflict Light damage.

skill.name: Improved Focus
skill.description:
Before combat, rapidly increase your Focus as well as your damage and Crit chance.
Focus is required to use some bow skills and is lost if you move.

skill.name: Imp. Penetrating Shot: Burn Through
skill.description:
A damaging shot that pierces enemy mitigations.
Arrows inflict fire damage.

skill.name: Improved Quick Shot
skill.description:
Nock and loose an arrow quickly.
Has a chance to generate additional Focus.

skill.name: Imp. Quick Shot: Elvish Arrow
skill.description:
Nock and loose an arrow quickly.
Has a chance to generate additional Focus.
Arrows inflict Light damage.

skill.name: Improved Chord of Salvation
skill.description: Instantly heals an ally's Morale, applying a small heal to their Fellowship.

skill.name: Improved Enlivening Grace
skill.description: Revives a defeated target, along with all Fellowship members nearby.

skill.name: Improved Song of Distraction
skill.description: A song that can make an enemy, and up to two other enemies within ten metres of the first, become drowsy and not detect players until they are much closer than normal. This does not work against monsters already engaged in combat.

skill.name: Improved Story of Courage
skill.description:
Removes one Poison, Fear, Disease, or Wound from nearby fellows. Protects against further Fears.
Removes additional Fear effects in a small area around your target.

skill.name: Raise the Spirit
skill.description: Quickly heals Morale of an ally or yourself.

skill.name: Raise My Spirit
skill.description: Quickly heals Morale (self-targetted).

skill.name: Bolster My Courage
skill.description: Significantly heals Morale (self-targetted).

skill.name: Bolster My Courage
skill.description: Significantly heals Morale (self-targetted).

skill.name: Improved Chord of My Salvation
skill.description: Instantly heals your Morale, applying a small heal to nearby Fellowship members.

skill.name: Improved Chord of Salvation
skill.description: Instantly heals an ally's Morale, applying a small heal to their Fellowship.

skill.name: Chord of Salvation
skill.description: Instantly heals an ally's Morale.

skill.name: Chord of My Salvation
skill.description: Instantly heals your Morale.

skill.name: Soliloquy of My Spirit
skill.description: Your tune is like a slow burning Soliloquy that keeps your spirit bolstered for a time. This is one of the few minstrel morale heals that can be used on the move.

skill.name: Improved Cry of the Valar
skill.description: Call upon a song to blast your enemies with an area-of-effect of light. This attack will also remove a Corruption buff from the enemies you hit and apply a small heal over time to you and fellowship members nearby.

skill.name: Improved Essay of Fire
skill.description: A Rune-keeper may compose a terrible essay of burning fury to bring to bear against their foes.

skill.name: Improved Sustaining Bolt
skill.description: The appropriate words may lessen the strain of exertion, enabling a Rune-keeper to sustain their powers for a longer time. Grants bonus Power if at 9 Battle Attunement.

skill.name: Improved Scathing Mockery
skill.description: Words of heated mockery written to all your foes cause them to burn under your derision. Apllies Writ of Fire to all effected foes.

skill.name: Improved Rousing Words
skill.description:
A channelled skill that heals Morale with every second.
+2 to Healing attunement.
This skill generates no threat.

skill.name: Improved Prelude to Hope
skill.description: Stories of great triumph begin with such preludes. Restores power as well if your ally has Writ of Health active. +2% healing per Healing attunement.

skill.name: Improved Sustaining Bolt
skill.description: The appropriate words may lessen the strain of exertion, enabling a Rune-keeper to sustain their powers for a longer time. Grants bonus Power if at 9 Battle Attunement.

skill.name: Fiery Ridicule
skill.description: The ridicule a Rune-keeper writes hurts more than a mundane scribe's ever could. The damage over time stacks.

skill.name: Fiery Ridicule
skill.description:
The ridicule a Rune-keeper writes hurts more than a mundane scribe's ever could. The damage over time stacks. Damage does not knockback this induction.
The afterburn of Fiery Ridicule deals 10% additional damage for each Wrath of Flame effect burning on your foes.

skill.name: Routing Cry (Defeat)
skill.description: Deals Light damage to nearby foes.

skill.name: Cry of the Chorus (Resonance)
skill.description: This skill provides you with three healing ballad bonus effects allowing access to Anthems and Codas. It also breaks any silence effects on you.

skill.name: Improved Cry of the Chorus (Dissonance)
skill.description: This skill provides you with three damage ballad bonus effects allowing access to Anthems and Codas. It also breaks any silence effects on you and provides you with a short term immunity to silence.

effect.name: Cry of The Chorus Silence Immunity

skill.name: Improved Cry of the Chorus (Resonance)
skill.description: This skill provides you with three power ballad bonus effects allowing access to Anthems and Codas. It also breaks any silence effects on you and provides you with a short term immunity to silence.

effect.name: Cry of The Chorus Silence Immunity

skill.name: Cry of the Chorus (Dissonance)
skill.description: This skill provides you with three damage ballad bonus effects allowing access to Anthems and Codas. It also breaks any silence effects on you.

skill.name: Major Ballad
skill.description:
Boosts healing capability and harms your foe.
Ballads unlock Anthems and Codas.

skill.name: Brawler: Quit Whining and Fight!
skill.description: You exhort and deride your allies, restoring some of their health. Heals all allies within radius.

skill.name: Seeds of Doubt
skill.description: Gríma Wormtongue excels at planting seeds of doubt in the minds of others. There are some, such as his master Saruman, who are not susceptible to his whispers.

skill.name: Improved Dire Need
skill.description: Half of your current power is expended. Three times the amount of power lost is transferred to Morale.

skill.name: Nature's Gift
skill.description: This skill brings Nature's Gift to all around the Spirit restoring morale.

skill.name: Flashing Flank
skill.description: This skill creates a burst of light in front of the targeted enemy causing them to become Flanked.

skill.name: Nature's Light
skill.description: This skill coats the targeted enemy in light, causing allies who attack that enemy to be healed a portion of the damage they deal.

skill.name: Commune with Nature
skill.description:
Summons a spirit companion.
The Spirit of Nature can greatly aid in restoring the Morale of your fellows.

skill.name: Improved Commune with Nature
skill.description:
Summons a spirit companion.
The Spirit of Nature can greatly aid in restoring the Morale of your fellows.

skill.name: Improved Hedge
skill.description: You make a melee attack, securing your weapons and altering your fighting position to make greater use of your armour and attempting to secure yourself from wounds. This will also now grant you more critical defence.

skill.name: Improved Hedge
skill.description: You are able to make a melee attack while regaining control of your weapons. This allows you to Parry regardless of stance. You also maximize the use of your armour increasing the value for a short time and gain more critical defence.

skill.name: Enhanced Battle Acuity
skill.description: You make a cunning attack that catches your opponents off-guard. Your area-of-effect attacks will deal even more damage for a short time.

skill.name: Improved Enhanced Battle Acuity
skill.description: You make a cunning attack that catches your opponents off-guard. Your area-of-effect attacks will deal even more damage for a short time. This costs one fewer fervour to activate.

skill.name: Guide to Stangard
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Stangard in Eorlsmead.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Muster in Stangard
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to Stangard in the Great River.

skill.name: Return to Galtrev
skill.description: Thanks to your friendship with the Men of Dunland, you're able to quickly return to Galtrev in Dunland. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Return to Stangard
skill.description: Thanks to your friendship with The Riders of Stangard, you're able to quickly return to Stangard in Eorlsmead. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Shadow
skill.description:
You attack your enemy from every shadow, dealing devastating damage.
<rgb=#FF7700>Maul becomes Sudden Maul.
Claws becomes Bestial Claws.
Savage Fangs becomes Shadow Fangs.
Eye Rake becomes Eye Gouge.
Snap becomes Snap!
Dire Howl becomes Howl from the Shadow.
Pack Hunters becomes Shadow Pack.
</rgb> <rgb=#00FFDD>Increased damage when attacking from behind.
Increased damage from Stealth.
Sudden Maul, Bestial Claws, and Pounce function as they are from stealth and cannot be Blocked, Parried or Evaded.</rgb>

skill.name: Brute
skill.description: Your brute strength strikes fear into the hearts of your enemies.

skill.name: Topple
skill.description: You strike your opponent with great force, knocking them off their feet.

skill.name: Bestial Claws
skill.description:
As a shadow, your swift movements conceal the bestial nature of your claws. Bonus critical chance.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

skill.name: Raking Claw
skill.description:
Your claws bite deeply, causing stinging and bleeding wounds.<rgb=#00ff00>
Places a bleed on target. Stacks 3 times.
Brute Bonus: Places an effect on target that increases Induction times. </rgb>

skill.name: Sudden Maul
skill.description:
With the element of surprise, your mauling attack is even more damaging.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Increased Critical Chance and Critical Damage
Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

skill.name: Agonizing Maul
skill.description:
You tear into your enemy with sharp claws, drawing fresh blood.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

skill.name: Brutal Fangs
skill.description: You rip at your target's flesh, tearing muscle and slowing his attacks. If the target was suffering from your crippling bite he begins taking damage over time.

skill.name: Shadow Fangs
skill.description: You rip at your target's flesh, tearing muscle and slowing his attacks. If the target was suffering from your crippling bite he begins taking damage over time.

skill.name: Howl from the Shadow
skill.description: You let loose an eerie howl, silencing enemies around you.

skill.name: Howl of Aggression
skill.description:
You let loose a fierce howl, disarming enemies around you. <rgb=#00ff00>
Disarms target.</rgb>

skill.name: Snap!
skill.description:
A sharp snap of your jaws and your target's offence is weakened.
On critical hit, your targets pain is so great they cannot speak but to scream for a few seconds.

skill.name: Muscle Tear
skill.description: You sink your teeth in and rip, slowing your targets attacks and movement.

skill.name: Eye Gouge
skill.description:
A swift swipe meant for the eyes. Breaks your opponent's concentration.
This skill will interrupt your target's inductions.
<rgb=#00FFDD>From Stealth: Decreases target's max range on their skills for 10 seconds.
Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

skill.name: Eye Gouge
skill.description:
A swift swipe meant for the eyes. Breaks your opponent's concentration.
This skill will interrupt your target's inductions.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

skill.name: Pack Flayers
skill.description: You sink your teeth into your opponent and shake violently, rooting them in place and lowering their defences.

skill.name: Shadow Pack
skill.description: You mark your territory, decreasing up to four enemies mitigations. Upon exiting your marked territory, your enemies take a reduced version of the debuff.

skill.name: Eye Gash
skill.description:
A swift swipe meant for the eyes. Breaks your opponent's concentration.
This skill will interrupt your target's inductions.
<rgb=#00ff00> Brute bonus: Decreases block, parry, and evade rating.</rgb>

skill.name: Call of Honour
skill.description:
This horn will summon Brúngwath and his shades to your aid.
<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This item may only be used at the appropriate time during the Brown Lands instance A Sunset Storm.</rgb>

skill.name: Oathbreakers' Bane
skill.description:
This medallion will grant you a buff to your damage output and in-combat power regeneration.
<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This item may only be used at the appropriate time during the Brown Lands instance Lights in the Land.</rgb>

mount.name: War-steed: Medium
mount.description: The Rouncey is a moderately armoured War-steed. The Rouncey provides balance and stability without sacrificing or favouring survivability or maneuverability.

mount.name: War-steed: Light
mount.description: The Courser is a lightly armoured War-steed. Fast and agile, the Courser provides the greatest speed and maneuverability on the battlefield, trading Endurance and Armour to retain their nimbleness.

mount.name: War-steed: Medium
mount.description: The Rouncey is a moderately armoured War-steed. The Rouncey provides balance and stability without sacrificing or favouring survivability or maneuverability.

mount.name: War-steed: Heavy
mount.description: The Destrier is a heavily armoured War-steed. Stalwart and imposing, The Destrier is bred for battle. The least agile and slowest of the war-steeds trades speed and maneuverability.

mount.name: War-steed: Heavy
mount.description: The Destrier is a heavily armoured War-steed. Stalwart and imposing, The Destrier is bred for battle. The least agile and slowest of the war-steeds trades speed and maneuverability.

mount.name: War-steed: Light

skill.name: Split Shot: Shafts of Light
skill.description:
Looses multiple arrows at once, hitting several targets in a small area.
Arrows inflict Light damage.
Split shot is treated as an Induction Skill.

skill.name: Split Shot: Hail of Fire
skill.description:
Looses multiple arrows at once, hitting several targets in a small area.
Arrows inflict fire damage.
Split shot is treated as an Induction Skill.

skill.name: Luminous Blood Arrow
skill.description:
A damaging shot that also restores the Hunter's Morale and removes Corruptions from the target.
Arrows inflict Light damage.

skill.name: Searing Blood Arrow
skill.description:
A damaging shot that also restores the Hunter's Morale and removes Corruptions from the target.
Arrows inflict fire damage.

skill.name: Heal
skill.description: Restore Morale to you, and a lesser amount to nearby allies

skill.name: Power of Knowledge
skill.description:
Lightning wreaths your enemy while restoring your own power.
Damage will not interrupt the drain.

skill.description: Transfers Power to nearby Fellows.

skill.name: Water-lore
skill.description: Heals Morale of allies.

skill.description:
A shot that dazes the target and reduces threat.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Split Shot
skill.description: You fire multiple arrows with a single pull hitting several targets in a medium area. Each target hit generates additional Focus.

skill.name: Improved Split Shot: Hail of Fire
skill.description: You fire multiple arrows with a single pull hitting several targets in a medium area. Each target hit generates additional Focus. Arrows inflict fire damage.

skill.name: Improved Split Shot: Shafts of Light
skill.description: You fire multiple arrows with a single pull hitting several targets in a medium area. Each target hit generates additional Focus. Arrows inflict Light damage.

skill.name: Guide to Caras Galadhon
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Caras Galadhon in Lothlorien.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Guide to the Misty Mountains
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Hrimbarg in the Misty Mountains.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Feign Injury
skill.description: You fake an injury just long enough to divert the enemy's attention elsewhere.

mount.sourceDescription: Available in the Riders of Rohan Base Edition, Heroic Edition or Legendary Edition.

mount.name: Steed of the Eastemnet
mount.sourceDescription: Available in the Riders of Rohan Base Edition, Heroic Edition or Legendary Edition.

skill.name: Bolstering Cry
skill.description: Crying out, you encourage your steed to continue the fight and restore a moderate amount of its endurance in the process.

skill.name: Invigourate
skill.description: You nurture your steed back to a battle-ready state, restoring its power over a short period of time.

skill.name: Rush of Energy
skill.description:
Thriving off the thrill of battle, your steed is able to push itself to the absolute limit and forgo all power costs for a short period of time. After the effect has ended, your steed will be completely drained of power.
<rgb=#FF0000>Mount Power must be less than 30%.</rgb>

skill.name: Dash
skill.description: Your steed pushes itself beyond normal limits, maintaining an increased speed for as long as its power holds out.

mount.name: Simbelmynë Horse
mount.sourceDescription: Available in the Spring Festival for Mithril Coins.
mount.description: A horse from the Spring Festival.

mount.name: Simbelmynë Pony
mount.sourceDescription: Available in the Spring Festival for Mithril Coins.
mount.description: A pony from the Spring Festival.

skill.name: Favour of the Mearas
skill.description: You have been granted the knowledge of mending your war-steed during combat. This skill will have no effect on standard steeds.

skill.name: Sacrifice
skill.description: You are able to put yourself in harm's way and absorb all incoming damage, protecting the steed while active.

skill.name: Steel Skin
skill.description: Your experience in battle has taught you how to make best use of your armour, which affords you and your steed an increased armour rating.

skill.name: Positive Thinking
skill.description: Increases the rider's Morale regen in and out of combat while active.

skill.name: Ride for Ruin
skill.description: You ride for ruin and for victory, greatly increasing your chance to land a critical hit.

skill.name: Quick Stop
skill.description: Command your war-steed to quickly stop at the cost of losing all of your Fury. This skill can be used at any speed, but it's most effective at high speeds or when you want to quickly change directions. You may also double-tap the back key to quickly stop.

skill.name: Soft Bat
skill.description: A bat made by the children, used for gentle whomping in a game of Brigand-bashing.

skill.name: Spread of Arrows
skill.description: Steadying yourself on your War-steed, you release several projectiles toward your target.

skill.name: Noble Arrow
skill.description: The Noble Arrow, once launched, will seek to injure your foe with critical intent.

skill.name: Seeking Arrow
skill.description: Steadying your mount, you attempt a well-placed shot at an enemy that will deal damage and apply a potentially harmful effect to your target.

skill.name: Discipline: Riddermark
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Riddermark</rgb> The Riddermark Discipline turns your focus toward controlling the tempo of battle against your enemies. Skills can influence the speed and attitude of your opponents throughout the course of battle.

skill.name: Kill Shot
skill.description:
Targeting the most vital areas of an opponent is difficult enough. While mounted it takes increased skill and effort; maybe even a little patience and luck, but when you strike with this skill the results are destructive.
<rgb=#FF7700>This skill has a reduced chance to hit unless the trait Shoot to Kill is active.</rgb>

skill.name: Discipline: Red Dawn
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Red Dawn</rgb> The Red Dawn Discipline turns your focus toward quickly dispatching your enemies in combat. Skills have the potential of dealing greater damage initially or over time.

skill.name: Seeking Arrow
skill.description: Steadying your mount, you attempt a well-placed shot at an enemy that will deal damage and apply a potentially harmful effect to your target.

skill.name: Spread of Arrows
skill.description: Steadying yourself on your War-steed, you release several projectiles toward your target.

skill.name: Flay Open
skill.description: You draw back your blade to carve a shallow gash through your enemy's flesh.

skill.name: Noble Arrow
skill.description: The Noble Arrow, once launched, will seek to injure your foe with critical intent.

skill.name: Flay Open
skill.description: You draw back your blade to carve a shallow gash through your enemy's flesh.

skill.name: Spread of Arrows
skill.description: Steadying yourself on your War-steed, you release several projectiles toward your target.

skill.name: Discipline: Rohirrim
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Rohirrim</rgb> The Rohirrim Discipline turns your focus toward survival in battle. Skills utilize your mount as a means to avoid direct conflict and to assist you in defending yourself throughout the course of a fight.

skill.name: Flay Open
skill.description: You draw back your blade to carve a shallow gash through your enemy's flesh.

skill.name: Noble Arrow
skill.description: The Noble Arrow, once launched, will seek to injure your foe with critical intent.

skill.name: Seeking Arrow
skill.description: Steadying your mount, you attempt a well-placed shot at an enemy that will deal damage and apply a potentially harmful effect to your target.

skill.name: Establishing Shot
skill.description: You release a projectile at your target without regard for aim. Though inaccurate, each successful strike with this skill will increase your chance to hit and your chance to score a critical strike against a target. You can gain these benefits up to 5 times. A succssful critical hit will dispel all stacked effects.

mount.name: Winged Herald Horse
mount.sourceDescription: Limited time availability for Figments of Splendour.

mount.name: Winged Herald Pony
mount.sourceDescription: Limited time availability for Figments of Splendour.

skill.name: Instigate
skill.description: You prefer to command the enemies' attention in battle and know how to instigate your opponent, generating threat over time.

skill.name: Arise
skill.description: Your steed is able to dig deep for something extra and instantly restores its power and fury.

skill.name: Mounted Strike
skill.description:
A simple passing attack that increases attacking strength when successful.
<rgb=#FF7700>Increases Fervour by 1</rgb>

skill.name: Discipline: Red Dawn
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Red Dawn</rgb>
The Red Dawn Discipline turns your focus to that of the relentless warrior. Damage is improved and your focus is only to force your enemies to yield on the field of battle.

skill.name: Discipline: Riddermark
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Riddermark</rgb>
The Riddermark Discipline turns your focus toward the tactical ebb and flow of a battle. Your attacks are meant to slow, disable or control the actions taken by your mounted enemies.

skill.name: Recuperate
skill.description: A Champion knows when they must leave the din of battle for brief respite, relying on their War-steed for safety.

skill.name: Swift Cut
skill.description:
A swift slice against an opponent dealing a little damage up front with a hefty bleed to follow.
<rgb=#FF7700>Increases Fervour by 1</rgb>

skill.name: Destabilizing Strike
skill.description: You call upon your inner reserve of strength to unnerve your opposition, forcing them to behave as you desire on the field of battle.

skill.name: Sundering Blow
skill.description:
A violent attack that deals damage to the target while healing the champion.
<rgb=#FF7700>Increases Fervour by 1</rgb>

skill.name: Horn Blast
skill.description: The Champion uses his battle-horn to drive fear into the hearts of his enemies and their steeds.

skill.name: Discipline: Rohirrim
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Rohirrim</rgb>
The Rohirrim Discipline turns your focus on defending self, steed and others. Though your damage is lowered, your overall survival is improved.

skill.name: a mounted melee attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when wielding only a single one-handed weapon.

skill.name: a mounted ranged attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when wielding a javelin.

skill.name: a mounted ranged attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when wielding a bow.

skill.name: a mounted unarmed attack
skill.description: Auto-attack when not wielding a weapon in the primary hand.

skill.name: a mounted melee attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when dual-wielding one-handed weapons.

skill.name: a mounted ranged attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when wielding a crossbow.

skill.name: a mounted melee attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when wielding a two-handed weapon.

skill.name: a mounted melee attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when wielding a one-handed weapon with a shield.

skill.name: Dash
skill.description: Your steed pushes itself beyond normal limits, increasing its speed for a short period of time.

skill.name: Tale of the Elements
skill.description: This aura increases the Fellowship's Tactical Mitigation.

skill.name: Call of Eärendil
skill.description: Resonance must be active to use this skill. Your words reflect upon the strength and glory of Eärendil, dealing AoE Light Damage and reducing the enemy's Light damage resistance.

mount.name: Noble Grey Pony
mount.sourceDescription: Not available at this time.

mount.name: Noble Grey Horse
mount.sourceDescription: Not available at this time.

skill.name: Improved Gift of the Hammerhand
skill.description:
Grants a bubble to multiple Fellowship members.
Bubble strength is 20% of the targets' Max Morale pool before other bonuses apply.

skill.name: Enheartening Valiant Strike
skill.description: A strike that instantly heals the Morale of nearby Fellows, and also grants a Heal-over-time.

skill.name: Valiant Strike
skill.description: A strike that instantly heals the Morale of your Shield-brother.

skill.name: Hammer of Rohan
skill.description: When called to action, the people of Rohan can smite their enemies with fierce cruelty and unnrelenting wrath.

skill.name: Discipline: Red Dawn
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Red Dawn</rgb>
The Red Dawn Discipline focuses your attention on the dissonant harmonies of the world. When applied correctly this dissonance can reduce your enemy's ability to remain on the field of battle.

skill.name: Ballad - Dirge
skill.description: Through the use of a dirge one can speak of the past glories of a fallen warrior and drain the very heart out of an enemy.

skill.name: Cry of the Eorlingas
skill.description: Crying for the wrath of Rohan, you unleash terrible ruin upon your foe.

skill.name: Call of the Eorlingas
skill.description: Your Call unleashes a fearsome assault on a target and enemies near the target.

skill.name: Call of the Eorlingas
skill.description: The Eorlingas can use the power of voice to calm or harm their enemies.

skill.name: Ballad - Saga
skill.description: Sagas tell tales of old that speak of the victory of light over darkness.

skill.name: Anthem of the Red Dawn
skill.description:
Your music culminates in a great Anthem that brings forth the wrath of Rohan, the Red Dawn.
<rgb=#FF7700>Alters Coda: instantly restores power to you and nearby fellowship members and war-steeds.</rgb>

skill.name: Call of the Eorlingas
skill.description: Your Call greatly heartens a rider and their war-steed.

skill.name: Cry of the Eorlingas
skill.description: Crying for the people of Rohan, you inspire an ally to take heart and find strength.

skill.name: Call of the Eorlingas
skill.description: Your Call restores heart to nearby allies and their war-steeds.

skill.name: Cry of the Eorlingas
skill.description: Crying to the land of Rohan, you strike your foe a powerful blow.

skill.name: Ballad - Chant
skill.description: A chant can be a powerful force of restoring courage upon the field of battle.

skill.name: Anthem of the Riddermark
skill.description:
Your music culminates in a great Anthem that reveres the land of Rohan, the Riddermark.
<rgb=#FF7700>Alters Coda: Your next Coda will increase mitigations for you, nearby fellowship members and war-steeds.</rgb>

skill.name: Coda of the Eorlingas
skill.description:
You unleash the culmination of your musical efforts into a power blast of light-based damage affecting an enemy target and those near the enemy.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 3 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb> <rgb=#00FFDD>Active Anthems add enhanced effects to the Coda.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Ballads from the Minstrel.</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Anthems from Minstrel.</rgb>

skill.name: Coda of the Eorlingas
skill.description:
You unleash the culmination of your musical efforts into a powerful and effective heal for you and up to eight friendly targets nearby.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 3 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb> <rgb=#00FFDD>Active Anthems add enhanced effects to the Coda.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Ballads from the Minstrel.</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Anthems from Minstrel.</rgb>

skill.name: Coda of the Eorlingas
skill.description:
You unleash the culmination of your musical efforts into a harmful blast of light-based damage affecting nearby enemies and restoring a fair amount of power to you and nearby friendly targets and war-steeds.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 3 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb> <rgb=#00FFDD>Active Anthems add enhanced effects to the Coda.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Ballads from the Minstrel.</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Anthems from Minstrel.</rgb>

skill.name: Anthems of the Rohirrim
skill.description:
Your music culminates in a great Anthem that reveres the people of Rohan, the Rohirrim.
<rgb=#FF7700>Alters Coda: Your next Coda causes your next Call of the Eorlingas to have no power cost.</rgb>

skill.name: Hammer of Rohan
skill.description: When called to action, the people of Rohan can smite their enemies with fierce cruelty and unnrelenting wrath.

skill.name: Discipline: Rohirrim
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Rohirrim</rgb>
The Rohirrim Discipline focuses your attention on the restorative nature of music, bolstering the resolve of yourself, your allies and war-steeds through this art.

skill.name: Call of the Eorlingas - Free
skill.description:
Your Call greatly heartens a rider and their war-steed.
<rgb=#FF7700>This skill will drain no power when executed.</rgb>

skill.name: Hammer of Rohan
skill.description: When called to action, the people of Rohan can smite their enemies with fierce cruelty and unnrelenting wrath.

skill.name: Discipline: Riddermark
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Riddermark</rgb>
The Riddermark Discipline focuses your attention on the harmonious relationship between the aspects of nurture and nature; bolstering self, allies and war-steeds while maintaining a measure of offensive capacity.

skill.name: Inspiring Blade of Elendil
skill.description:
Requires Battle-hardened State.
Deal an attack with an increased Crit chance, and also remove Corruption.
Fellows within range gain the Light of Elendil, enabling them to deal additional Light damage.
Your next Words of Courage, Shadow's Lament, or Threatening Shout will be more potent.

skill.name: Pledge to Rohan
skill.description: Issuing a pledge to the land of Rohan you support your fellowship and strengthen yourself in the process.

skill.name: Clash of Arms
skill.description: Using superior tactics, you deal very little damage to a target but assess the enemy so well that you gain a significant advantage over your foe.

skill.name: Staggering Slash
skill.description: A brutal strike against rider and steed, this slash is meant to weaken your enemy, leaving them susceptible to further attack.

skill.name: Discipline: Rohirrim
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Rohirrim</rgb>
The Rohirrim Discipline turns your focus to steeling yourself against the enemy's attack, drawing their ire and defending your allies from enemy assaults.

skill.name: Serrated Edge
skill.description: The initial impact of your weapon is meant to injure your foe, but the true damage is unleashed as you drag your weapon across your foe's flesh.

skill.name: Discipline: Red Dawn
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Red Dawn</rgb>
The Red Dawn Discipline turns your focus to overpowering your foes with devastating attacks.

skill.name: Discipline: Riddermark
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Riddermark</rgb>
The Riddermark Discipline turns your focus to steering the course of battle while maintaining your ability to protect allies from enemy assault.

skill.name: Driving Slash
skill.description: Using a violent slash against the target you attempt to seriously injure your foe.

skill.name: Rohan's Edge
skill.description:
A powerful attack, further enhanced when landing a critical strike that will cause your next attack to inspire you and your nearby fellowship members.
<rgb=#FF7700>After scoring a critical with Rohan's Edge, your next skill-based attack will instantly restore a small amount of morale to you, your fellowship members and war-steeds within 40 metres.</rgb>

skill.name: Objective Minded
skill.description: Increase the speed of picking up the Muckle

skill.name: Rend
skill.description: Rend your foe

skill.name: Traumatizing Blow
skill.description: Traumatize your foe

skill.name: Sprint
skill.description: Increase movespeed and negate Snares

skill.name: Snare
skill.description: Snare your foe

skill.name: Weaken
skill.description: Weaken your foe

skill.name: Fortitude
skill.description: Increase your mitigations

skill.name: Cleanse
skill.description: Remove all CC and provide immunity to CC

skill.name: Empower
skill.description: Increase tactical and physical mastery

skill.name: Discipline: Riddermark
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Riddermark</rgb>
The Riddermark Discipline allows the Lore-master to focus on Beast-lore, turning their attention to the weakening or enhancement of beasts.

skill.name: Bond of the Rider
skill.description: So complete is the Lore-master's understanding and bond with their War-steed that they can influence the morale and state of a war-steed.

skill.name: Metal and Mettle
skill.description:
You use your sword and staff to deliver a powerful strike to the enemy before you.
When your companion has Flanked the enemy, this skill will restore a small amount of power.

skill.name: Mearas-lore
skill.description: One with nature and the elements the Mearas are adepts at using the natural world against their enemies; as students of nature, beasts and hidden lore so too are Lore-masters who study these wild horses.

skill.name: Radiant Burst
skill.description:
You hurl a lens toward your target distracting and potentially dismounting them. The glimmering light will attract a murder of crows to hamper the target's movement once the distraction dissipates.
<rgb=#ff6600>This skill cannot be used on a target under the effects of 'Murder of Crows' the movement reducing effect applied by Radiant Burst.</rgb>

skill.name: Mearas-lore
skill.description: One with nature and the elements the Mearas are adepts at using the natural world against their enemies; as students of nature, beasts and hidden lore so too are Lore-masters who study these wild horses.

skill.name: Enduring Embers
skill.description:
Using your knoweldge of fire and all that burns, you heave handfuls of pitch soaked embers at your target. They burn hotter and hotter over time.
When your companion has Flanked the enemy, this skill will deal additional damage. <rgb=#FF7700>
The effects from this skill can stack up to 3 times.</rgb>

skill.name: Discipline: Rohirrim
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Rohirrim</rgb>
The Rohirrim Discipline allows the Lore-master to turn their attention to the elements and natural aspects of the world around them.

skill.description: Cures a harmful debuff affecting your Fellowship.

effect.name: Remove Fear, Poison, Disease, or Wound

skill.description: Cures poison on an ally.

Your vicious claws allow you to tear through even the toughest armour. This skill is only effective against players.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Bypasses Mitigations</rgb>

skill.name: Shield Bash
skill.description: You bash the enemy in the face with your shield, disorienting them for a few moments. A critical hit refreshes your shield-arm, allowing you to bash someone in the face again.

skill.name: Constant Pain
skill.description: The Defiler inflicts terrible pain upon a foe. Nearby allies find the enemy's suffering so joyous, they regain morale.

skill.name: Horn of Champions
skill.description: Area effect attack that demoralizes nearby enemies and reduces their damage for a short duration.

skill.name: Improved Bracing Attack
skill.description: You make an attack which allows you to brace yourself against counterattack, increasing your Morale by a small amount. Your Morale will increase even if this attack is avoided.

skill.name: Improved Bracing Attack
skill.description: You make an attack which allows you to brace yourself against counterattack, increasing your Morale by a small amount. Your Morale will increase even if this attack is avoided.

A precise throw can pin a target to the ground and hinder its movement for a short while thereafter.

skill.description: You make a powerful melee attack, followed by a quick off-hand swipe. Critical Hits will increase your Critical Hit chance for a short period of time.

<rgb=#66ffff>Rohirrim</rgb>
The Rohirrim Discipline focuses on the Captain's ability to lead as the vanguard on the battlefield. This enhances their ability to command a battlefield and direct combat to their desire.

skill.name: Oppressive Blow
skill.description: A full-force strike against a target that has the potential to inspire your efforts against your enemies.

skill.name: Measured Attack
skill.description: Using the speed and momentum of your horse, you swing mightily against your opponent, attempting to weaken their defences.

skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat
<rgb=#66ffff>Red Dawn</rgb>
The Red Dawn discipline allows the Captain to draw upon the prowess that made him a leader of the Free People, enhancing the relentless and tenacious nature of true leaders.

skill.name: Discipline: Riddermark
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat
<rgb=#66ffff>Riddermark</rgb>
The Riddermark Discipline enhances the Captain's role as the Standard-bearing, inspirational leader of the Free Peoples. This enhances their ability to turn the tide in battle.

skill.name: Cry Havoc
skill.description: A damaging cry that has the potential to truly disrupt your enemies and inspire you and your allies.

skill.name: Splint
skill.description: Splints are used in setting broken bones, particularly in the legs.

skill.name: Bandage
skill.description: Bandages are primarily used in patching the arms of wounded soldiers.

skill.name: Salve
skill.description: Salves heal cuts and slices in flesh.

skill.name: Intimidate
skill.description: You let forth a mighty scream that frightens your target, forcing them to turn and flee from battle for a short time.

skill.name: Coax
skill.description: You issue forth a mighty scream taunting your enemy and coaxing them to ride alongside of you.

skill.name: Caution
skill.description: Your cry warns your target of your ferocity and forces them to ride alongside you at a distance for a short time.

skill.name: Trick: Stratagem
skill.description: A good Burglar knows how to plan for any situation and how to apply their knowledge to the best outcome at all times.

skill.name: Ride By
skill.description: What would appear to be a glancing blow is actually a well-calculated strike providing you with an advantage on the battlefield.

skill.name: Ranged Safeguard
skill.description:
A quick strike, which damages the enemy and heals you over time.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Ranged Celebration of Skill
skill.description:
An impressive movement that restores a significant amount of morale.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Ranged Persevere
skill.description:
A shield strike, which heals you over time and increases incoming healing.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Ranged Restoration
skill.description:
A masterful skill which applies a powerful heal-over-time effect.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Dash
skill.description: Your steed pushes itself beyond normal limits, increasing its speed for a short period of time.

skill.name: Strike with Power
skill.description: A violent strike against the target that focuses on your offensive capability, dealing damage and increasing threat against the target.

skill.name: Skill of the Eorlingas
skill.description: The ultimate expression of tactical horsemanship, this is a dangerous strike on its own; when enhanced by the Rohirrim Discipline your defensive capacity is increased.

skill.name: Strike with Power
skill.description: A violent strike against the target that focuses on your offensive capability, dealing damage and increasing threat against the target.

skill.name: Skill of the Eorlingas
skill.description: The ultimate expression of tactical horsemanship, this is a dangerous strike on its own; when enhanced by the Riddermark Discipline your ranged damage is increased.

skill.name: Clash of Steel and Will
skill.description: This quick strike saps your target's morale and has a chance on a critical strike to restore power to you and your war-steed.

skill.name: Assault of the Eorlingas
skill.description:
A violent strike against the target that focuses on your offensive capability, dealing damage and increasing threat against the target.
<rgb=#66ffff>Applies the Lance effect to you. Skill of the Eorlingas becomes Lancer's Charge.</rgb>

skill.name: Defence of the Eorlingas
skill.description:
You focus on defence through offence, reducing the target's armour and increasing your damage for a time.
<rgb=#66ffff>Applies the Shield effect to you. Skill of the Eorlingas becomes Shield the Flank.</rgb>

effect.name: Defence of the Eorlingas - Red Dawn

skill.name: Clash of Steel and Will
skill.description: This quick strike saps your target's morale and has a chance on a critical strike to restore morale to you and your war-steed

effect.name: Clash of Steel and Will: Morale

skill.name: Lancer's Charge
skill.description: The ultimate expression of tactical horsemanship, this is a dangerous strike on its own; when enhanced by the Red Dawn Discipline your melee damage is increased.

skill.name: Halt the Charge - Light
skill.description: The ultimate expression of tactical horsemanship, this is a dangerous strike on its own; when enhanced by the Riddermark Discipline your ranged damage is increased.

skill.name: Defence of the Eorlingas
skill.description:
You focus on defence through speed manipulation, lowering your target's speed for a time.
<rgb=#66ffff>Applies the Shield effect to you. Skill of the Eorlingas becomes Shield the Flank.</rgb>

skill.name: Discipline: Rohirrim
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat
<rgb=#66ffff>Rohirrim</rgb>
The Rohirrim Discipline focuses on the Warden's ability to lead his War-steed at the head of a mounted conflict; enhancing his ability to survive against overwhelming odds.

skill.name: Strike with Power
skill.description: A violent strike against the target that focuses on your offensive capability, dealing damage and increasing threat against the target.

skill.name: Clash of Steel and Will
skill.description: This quick strike saps your target's morale and has a chance on a critical strike to restore power to you and your war-steed.

skill.name: Assault of the Eorlingas
skill.description:
A violent strike against the target that focuses on your offensive capability, this skill is executed at range.
<rgb=#66ffff>Applies the Lance effect to you. Skill of the Eorlingas becomes Lancer's Charge.</rgb>

skill.name: Roar of the Eorlingas
skill.description:
You issue a loud cry drawing the heart out of the enemy, dealing damage and slightly increasing threat against the target.
<rgb=#66ffff>Applies the Shout effect to you. Skill of the Eorlingas becomes Halt the Charge.</rgb>

skill.name: Halt the Charge
skill.description: The ultimate expression of tactical horsemanship, this is a dangerous strike on its own; when enhanced by the Riddermark Discipline your ranged damage is increased.

skill.description:

<rgb=#66ffff>Applies the Lance effect to you. Skill of the Eorlingas becomes Lancer's Charge.</rgb>

skill.name: Assault of the Eorlingas
skill.description:
A violent strike against the target that focuses on your offensive capability, dealing damage and applying a bleed to the target.
<rgb=#66ffff>Applies the Lance effect to you. Skill of the Eorlingas becomes Lancer's Charge.</rgb>

skill.description:
You focus on defence, increasing your War-steed's agility and armour.
<rgb=#66ffff>Applies the Shield effect to you. Skill of the Eorlingas becomes Shield the Flank.</rgb>

Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat
<rgb=#66ffff>Red Dawn</rgb>
The Red Dawn discipline transforms you into a fearsome adversary specialising in the joust and return nature of close mounted combat.

<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat
<rgb=#66ffff>Riddermark</rgb>
The Riddermark Discipline enhances the your overall skill and utility while on your war-steed trading spear for javelin and taking the battle to the far field.

skill.description: The ultimate expression of tactical horsemanship, this is a dangerous strike on its own; when enhanced by the Riddermark Discipline your ranged damage is increased.

skill.name: Clash of Steel and Will
skill.description: This quick strike saps your target's morale and has a chance on a critical strike to restore morale to you and your war-steed.

skill.description: The ultimate expression of tactical horsemanship, this is a dangerous strike on its own; when enhanced by the Red Dawn Discipline your melee damage is increased.

skill.description: The ultimate expression of tactical horsemanship, this is a dangerous strike on its own; when enhanced by the Riddermark Discipline your ranged damage is increased.

skill.name: Strike with Power
skill.description: A violent strike against the target that focuses on your offensive capability, dealing damage and increasing threat against the target.

skill.name: Improved Rune of Restoration
skill.description: Places a stone covered with runes of restoration, power, and grace upon the ground. The stone cannot be healed. A Rune-keeper may only have one stone active at a time.

skill.name: Improved Scribe's Spark
skill.description:
A basic lightning rune deals lightning damage and builds battle attunement.
Decreases threat.

skill.name: Armour of The Elements
skill.description:
A thin armour of lightning covers your body. Melee attackers have a chance to be dazed for 5 seconds. Additionally you are protected from an amount of future damage.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Daze replaced with a debuff that reduces damage against dismounted players.</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Rune of Restoration
skill.description: Places a stone covered with runes of restoration, power, and grace upon the ground. The stone cannot be healed. A Rune-keeper may only have one stone active at a time.

skill.name: Toxic Carapace
skill.description:
Corruption: A venomous secretion coats your carapace, protecting you and causing damage to attackers.
<rgb=#00ff00>Consumes all Venom. For each Venom consumed, you receive another tier of the effect, extending the duration and increasing its initial potency.</rgb>

skill.name: Oration of the Bleak Sky
skill.description: A quick reflection on the power of words yields a damaging or inspiring effect to the Rune-keeper's enemies or allies.

effect.name: Oration of the Bleak Sky - Direction

skill.name: Debate
skill.description:
<rgb=#66ffff>In Rohirrim</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>A debate on the nature of the People of Rohan provides you with a nearer bond with friendly targets around you.</rgb>
<rgb=#66ffff>In Riddermark</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>One should take care when debating the nature of the Lands of Rohan with a Rune-keeper else they find themselves wishing the land would loosen its grasp upon them.</rgb>
<rgb=#66ffff>In Red Dawn</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>One should be careful when debating the ruin and wrath wrought by the Red Dawn, else it shall find a way to vist ruin upon them.</rgb>

skill.name: Resolution of Storms
skill.description: In the end, everything comes to resolution. Some may not enjoy the final result.

skill.name: Resolution of Fire
skill.description: In the end, everything comes to resolution. Some may not enjoy the final result.

skill.name: Resolution
skill.description:
<rgb=#66ffff>In Rohirrim</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>All things end, and sometimes the resolution brings great succor.</rgb>
<rgb=#66ffff>In Riddermark</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>All things end, and once resolved one can find they have been dumbfounded.</rgb>
<rgb=#66ffff>In Red Dawn</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>All things end, and when fire is involved all that remains is ash and ruin.</rgb>

skill.name: Debate the Land
skill.description: A strength that all Rune-keepers possess is the ability to speak well on any subject. This proves to be a great benefit in the midst of a heated debate, and this benefit can prove very potent and effective.

skill.name: Discipline: Rohirrim
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat
<rgb=#66ffff>Rohirrim</rgb>
The Rohirrim Discipline turns your attention to supporting your allies through the use of healing runes and script.

skill.name: Oration
skill.description:
<rgb=#66ffff>In Rohirrim</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>The power of runes and speech are used to creating a mending and inspiring oration.</rgb>
<rgb=#66ffff>In Riddermark</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>The power of speech and runes are woven together to draw one's attention to the bleak sky, calling ruin and fear from above.</rgb>
<rgb=#66ffff>In Red Dawn</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>The power of speech and runes are woven together to draw upon the power of potent embers to burn the target and potentially weaken them to flame.</rgb>

skill.name: Fixation
skill.description:
<rgb=#66ffff>In Rohirrim</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>Focusing on runes of longevity coupled with runes of inspiration the Rune-keeper ably inspires a friendly target.</rgb>
<rgb=#66ffff>In Riddermark</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>The chilling nature of frost is coupled with runes of longevity to impose the a bone-numbing slow to come over an enemy target.</rgb>
<rgb=#66ffff>In Red Dawn</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>The slow nature of a flame that consumes is coupled with runes of longevity to bring about a long slow burn on an enemy target.</rgb> This effect can stack up to three times.

skill.name: Discipline: Red Dawn
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat
<rgb=#66ffff> Red Dawn</rgb>
The Red Dawn discipline focuses on runes that call to fire and destruction, calling the most power and potent of the Rune-keeper's arsenal to bear.

skill.name: Invoke the Elements
skill.description: Calling upon etchings representing the elements, the Rune-keeper composes a symbol with disastrous intent.

skill.name: Debate Wrath
skill.description: A strength that all Rune-keepers possess is the ability to speak well on any subject. This proves to be a great benefit in the midst of a heated debate, and this benefit can prove very potent and effective.

skill.name: Resolution of Enduring Life
skill.description: In the end, everything comes to resolution. Some may not enjoy the final result.

skill.name: Inspirational Verse
skill.description: You focus your energies and etchings toward supporting you and your allies finding inspiration in the verses.

skill.name: Discipline: Riddermark
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat
<rgb=#66ffff>Riddermark</rgb>
The Riddermark Discipline focuses on the chilling and enervating runes of storm. When carved and etched correctly you can manipulate the actions of your enemies.

skill.name: Fixation of Health
skill.description: Focusing on runes of longevity coupled with runes of inspiration the Rune-keeper ably inspires a friendly target. This effect can stack up to three times.

skill.name: Fixation of Flame
skill.description: The slow nature of a flame that consumes is coupled with runes of longevity to bring about a long slow burn on an enemy target. This effect can stack up to three times.

skill.name: Ameliorating Oration
skill.description: A quick reflection on the power of words yields a damaging or inspiring effect to the Rune-keeper's enemies or allies.

skill.name: Debate the People
skill.description: A strength that all Rune-keepers possess is the ability to speak well on any subject. This proves to be a great benefit in the midst of a heated debate, and this benefit can prove very potent and effective.

skill.name: Oration of Embers
skill.description: A quick reflection on the power of words yields a damaging or inspiring effect to the Rune-keeper's enemies or allies.

skill.name: Fixation of Storm
skill.description: The chilling nature of frost is coupled with runes of longevity to impose the a bone-numbing slow to come over an enemy targets.

skill.name: Improved Addle
skill.description:
Causes the enemy to fail skill attempts, and subsequent skill attempts will briefly take longer to execute.
Target deals less tactical damage.

skill.name: Diversion
skill.description:
Divert the enemy's attention briefly from yourself while in Stealth.
Does not break Stealth.

skill.name: Spur On
skill.description:
You drive your War-steed to carry you directly to a foe.
<rgb=#FF6600>Your next non-self targeted skill will move you directly toward your target, executing the skill when you are in range. This effect is consumed when a skill is successfully executed.</rgb>

skill.name: Muster in the Misty Mountains
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to the Misty Mountains.

effect.name: Warden Travel to the Misty Mountains

skill.name: Muster in Caras Galadhon
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to Caras Galadhon in Lothlórien.

skill.name: Trample
skill.description: Your steed is able to barrel over unmounted foes dealing massive damage.

mount.name: War-steed: Medium
mount.description: The Rouncey is a moderately armoured War-steed. The Rouncey provides balance and stability without sacrificing or favouring survivability or manoeuvrability.

mount.name: War-steed: Medium
mount.description: The Rouncey is a moderately armoured War-steed. The Rouncey provides balance and stability without sacrificing or favouring survivability or manoeuvrability.

skill.name: Impale
skill.description:
You violently stab at your opponent, doing additional damage to enemies wounded by your bleeds.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Ignores 30% of the target's mitigations.
Does 25% additional damage per bleed, which ignores all mitigations.</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Shield-swipe
skill.description: After successfully blocking an enemy's blow, you may attack with both your weapon and shield. This skill draws the enemy's attention to yourself.

skill.name: Sweeping Cut
skill.description: A sweeping back-and forth strike in a frontal arc.

skill.name: Thrust
skill.description:
Deal a thrusting blow to open a Deep Wound.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires the use of Breach, or Whirling Breach.</rgb>

skill.name: Improved Shield-blow
skill.description: You strike your opponent with your shield.

skill.name: Improved Sweeping Cut
skill.description: Large sweeping strokes cut into all of your foes standing before you causing them to bleed.

skill.name: Litany of Defiance
skill.description: After successfully blocking an enemy's blow, the guardian screams out a string of taunts that affect all those around him, with an aggro over time effect.

skill.name: Improved Whirling Retaliation
skill.description: After parrying, whirl to attack enemies in a circle. This will worsen wounds opened by Thrust and Improved Sweeping Cut.

skill.name: Improved Sweeping Cut
skill.description: Large sweeping strokes cut into all of your foes standing before you causing them to bleed.

skill.name: a mounted ranged attack
skill.description: You auto-attack when wielding a bow.

skill.name: Recuperate
skill.description: A Champion knows when they must leave the din of battle for brief respite, relying on their War-steed for safety.

skill.name: Sundering Blow
skill.description:
A violent attack dealing good damage to a target. Critical strikes cause enhanced effects.
<rgb=#FF7700>Increases Fervour by 1</rgb>

skill.name: Swift Cut
skill.description:
A swift slice against an opponent dealing a little damage up front with a hefty bleed to follow.
<rgb=#FF7700>Increases Fervour by 1</rgb>

skill.name: Horn Blast
skill.description: The Champion uses his battle-horn to drive fear into the hearts of his enemies and their steeds.

skill.name: Destabilizing Strike
skill.description: You call upon your inner reserve of strength to unnerve your opposition, forcing them to behave as you desire on the field of battle.

skill.name: Recuperate
skill.description: A Champion knows when they must leave the din of battle for brief respite, relying on their War-steed for safety.

skill.name: Sundering Blow
skill.description:

<rgb=#FF7700>Increases Fervour by 1</rgb>

skill.name: Swift Cut
skill.description:
A swift slice against an opponent dealing a little damage up front with a hefty bleed to follow.
<rgb=#FF7700>Increases Fervour by 1</rgb>

skill.name: Horn Blast
skill.description: The Champion uses his battle-horn to drive fear into the hearts of his enemies and their steeds.

skill.name: Destabilizing Strike
skill.description: You call upon your inner reserve of strength to unnerve your opposition, forcing them to behave as you desire on the field of battle.

skill.name: Accurate Spear-toss
skill.description: You take your time and aim at the target. You are sure to hit it.

skill.name: Spear-toss
skill.description: You throw the spear at the target. Your odds of striking it are roughly even.

skill.name: Quick Spear-toss
skill.description: You quickly throw the spear in the direction of the target. It is not likely to strike.

skill.name: Ballad - Chant
skill.description: A chant can be a powerful force of restoring courage upon the field of battle.

skill.name: Ballad - Dirge
skill.description: Through the use of a dirge one can speak of the past glories of a fallen warrior and drain the very heart out of an enemy.

skill.name: Ballad - Saga
skill.description: Sagas tell tales of old that speak of the victory of light over darkness.

skill.name: Coda of the Eorlingas
skill.description:
You unleash the culmination of your musical efforts into a powerful and effective heal for you and up to eight friendly targets nearby.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 3 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb> <rgb=#00FFDD>Active Anthems add enhanced effects to the Coda.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Ballads from the Minstrel.</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Anthems from Minstrel.</rgb>

skill.name: Coda of the Eorlingas
skill.description:
You unleash the culmination of your musical efforts into a harmful blast of light-based damage affecting nearby enemies and restoring a fair amount of power to you and nearby friendly targets and war-steeds.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 3 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb> <rgb=#00FFDD>Active Anthems add enhanced effects to the Coda.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Ballads from the Minstrel.</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Anthems from Minstrel.</rgb>

skill.name: Coda of the Eorlingas
skill.description:
You unleash the culmination of your musical efforts into a power blast of light-based damage affecting an enemy target and those near the enemy.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 3 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb> <rgb=#00FFDD>Active Anthems add enhanced effects to the Coda.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Ballads from the Minstrel.</rgb> <rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Anthems from Minstrel.</rgb>

skill.name: Anthem of the Riddermark
skill.description:
Your music culminates in a great Anthem that reveres the land of Rohan, the Riddermark.
<rgb=#FF7700>Alters Coda: Your next Coda will increase mitigations for you, nearby fellowship members and war-steeds.</rgb>

skill.name: Anthem of the Red Dawn
skill.description:
Your music culminates in a great Anthem that brings forth the wrath of Rohan, the Red Dawn.
<rgb=#FF7700>Alters Coda: instantly restores power to you and nearby fellowship members and war-steeds.</rgb>

skill.name: Anthem of the Rohirrim
skill.description:
Your music culminates in a great Anthem that reveres the people of Rohan, the Rohirrim.
<rgb=#FF7700>Alters Coda: Your next Coda causes your next Call of the Eorlingas to have no power cost.</rgb>

skill.name: Seeking Arrow - Light
skill.description: Steadying your mount, you attempt a well-placed shot at an enemy that will deal Light-based damage and apply a potentially harmful effect to your target.

skill.name: Establishing Shot - Fire
skill.description: You release a projectile at your target without regard for aim. Though inaccurate, each successful strike with this skill will increase your chance to hit and your chance to score a critical strike against a target. You can gain these benefits up to 5 times. A succssful critical hit will dispel all stacked effects.

skill.name: Spread of Arrows - Fire
skill.description: Steadying yourself on your War-steed, you release several Fire-based projectiles toward your target.

skill.name: Noble Arrow - Light
skill.description: The Noble Arrow of Light, once launched, will seek to injure your foe with critical intent.

skill.name: Seeking Arrow - Fire
skill.description: Steadying your mount, you attempt a well-placed shot at an enemy that will deal Fire-based damage and apply a potentially harmful effect to your target.

skill.description: Steadying yourself on your War-steed, you release several Light-based damage projectiles toward your target.

skill.description: The Noble Arrow of Fire, once launched, will seek to injure your foe with critical intent.

skill.name: Spread of Arrows - Fire
skill.description: Steadying yourself on your War-steed, you release several Fire-based projectiles toward your target.

skill.name: Kill Shot - Light
skill.description:
Targeting the most vital areas of an opponent is difficult enough. While mounted it takes increased skill and effort; maybe even a little patience and luck, but when you strike with this skill the results are destructive.
<rgb=#FF7700>This skill has a reduced chance to hit unless the trait Shoot to Kill is active.</rgb>
