mount.name: Summerdays Pony
mount.sourceDescription: Available during the Farmer's Faire Festival for Mithril Coins.

mount.name: Summerdays Horse
mount.sourceDescription: Available during the Farmer's Faire Festival for Mithril Coins.

skill.name: Put on the Ring
skill.description: Frodo is the Ringbearer, and in time of utmost need he can put on the One Ring and vanish from sight.

skill.name: Rohan's Edge
skill.description:
A powerful attack, further enhanced when landing a critical strike that will cause your next attack to inspire you and your nearby fellowship members.
<rgb=#FF7700>After scoring a critical with Rohan's Edge, your next skill-based attack will increase the damage dealt by you, your fellowship members and war-steeds within 40 metres for 10 seconds.</rgb>

skill.name: Clash of Arms
skill.description: Using superior tactics, you deal very little damage to a target but assess the enemy so well that you gain a significant advantage over your foe.

skill.name: Staggering Slash
skill.description: A brutal strike against rider and steed, this slash is meant to weaken your enemy, leaving them susceptible to further attack.

skill.name: Rohan's Edge
skill.description:
A powerful attack, further enhanced when landing a critical strike that will cause your next attack to inspire you and your nearby fellowship members.
<rgb=#FF7700>After scoring a critical with Rohan's Edge, your next skill-based attack will instantly restore a small amount of power to you, your fellowship members and war-steeds within 40 metres.</rgb>

skill.name: Driving Slash
skill.description: Using a violent slash against the target you attempt to seriously injure your foe.

skill.name: Clash of Arms
skill.description: Using superior tactics, you deal very little damage to a target but assess the enemy so well that you gain a significant advantage over your foe.

skill.name: Staggering Slash
skill.description: A brutal strike against rider and steed, this slash is meant to weaken your enemy, leaving them susceptible to further attack.

skill.name: Driving Slash
skill.description: Using a violent slash against the target you attempt to seriously injure your foe.

skill.name: Sign of Power: Inspiration
skill.description: The Lore-master marks an enemy and allows his allies and their mounts to draw inspiration from fighting the marked foe.

skill.name: Enduring Embers
skill.description:
Using your knoweldge of fire and all that burns, you heave handfuls of pitch soaked embers at your target. They burn hotter and hotter over time.
When your companion has Flanked the enemy, this skill will deal additional damage. <rgb=#FF7700>
The effects from this skill can stack up to 3 times.</rgb>

skill.name: Sign of Power: Inspiration
skill.description: The Lore-master marks an enemy and allows his allies and their mounts to draw inspiration from fighting the marked foe.

skill.name: Enduring Embers

The effects from this skill can stack up to 3 times.</rgb>

skill.name: Measured Attack
skill.description: Using the speed and momentum of your horse, you swing mightily against your opponent, attempting to weaken their defences.

skill.name: Oppressive Blow
skill.description: A full-force strike against a target that has the potential to inspire your efforts against your enemies.

skill.name: Oppressive Blow
skill.description: A full-force strike against a target that has the potential to inspire your efforts against your enemies.

skill.name: Measured Attack
skill.description: Using the speed and momentum of your horse, you swing mightily against your opponent, attempting to weaken their defences.

skill.name: Use Hobbit-sense
skill.description: Samwise Gamgee may not be strong, or fast, or indeed very smart... but he has plain old hobbit-sense and it serves him well.

skill.name: Muster in Snowbourn
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to Snowbourn in eastern Rohan.

skill.name: Guide to Snowbourn
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Snowbourn in eastern Rohan.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Return to Snowbourn
skill.description: Thanks to your friendship with the Men of the Sutcrofts, you're able to quickly return to Snowbourn in the Sutcrofts. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: The Horn of Gondor
skill.description: Boromir carries a horn with which he can summon aid during times of greatest need.

skill.name: Stone Throw
skill.description: Hobbits are skilled at the throwing of stones, and have unerring accuracy.

skill.name: Quick Sting
skill.description: Frodo wields Sting, the blade given to him by Bilbo, and can use it to quickly strike an enemy.

skill.name: Speed of Worry
skill.description: Frodo has a lot to think about, and the worries that weigh so heavily do not slow his steps.

skill.name: Mighty Strike
skill.description: The strength of Boromir's arm can lend great force to this mighty strike.

skill.name: Quick Attack
skill.description: Boromir can make a quick stab with his sword that can surprise even the toughest foe.

skill.name: Sword Sweep
skill.description: This powerful sword swing damages enemies in front of Boromir, Gondor's favourite son.

skill.name: Destroy Foes of Gondor!
skill.description: This powerful sword strike does incredible damage to an enemy of Gondor, and Boromir can use it more often than lesser Men.

skill.name: Orc Hewer
skill.description: Boromir can swing his sword in a low arc, hewing Orcs at the knees and causing them to bleed profusely.

skill.name: Mearas-lore
skill.description: One with nature and the elements the Mearas are adepts at using the natural world against their enemies; as students of nature, beasts and hidden lore so too are Lore-masters who study these wild horses.

skill.name: Mearas-lore
skill.description: One with nature and the elements the Mearas are adepts at using the natural world against their enemies; as students of nature, beasts and hidden lore so too are Lore-masters who study these wild horses.

mount.name: Pony of the Red Dawn
mount.sourceDescription: Not available at this time.

mount.name: Horse of the Red Dawn
mount.sourceDescription: Not available at this time.

skill.name: Break Free
skill.description: With great ardour you spur your steed onward, breaking it free of its bonds. Your steed is provided with immunity to such effects for a short period of time.

mount.name: War-steed: Medium
mount.description: The Rouncey is a moderately armoured War-steed. The Rouncey provides balance and stability without sacrificing or favouring survivability or manoeuvrability.

mount.name: War-steed: Heavy
mount.description: The Destrier is a heavily armoured War-steed. Stalwart and imposing, The Destrier is bred for battle. The least agile and slowest of the war-steeds trades speed and maneuverability.

mount.name: War-steed: Light
mount.description: The Courser is a lightly armoured War-steed. Fast and agile, the Courser provides the greatest speed and maneuverability on the battlefield, trading Endurance and Armour to retain their nimbleness.

skill.name: Cry of the Hunter
skill.description: The Hunter can escape from countless foes.

skill.name: Improved Shield-swipe
skill.description: After successfully blocking an enemy's blow, you may attack with both your weapon and shield.

skill.name: Strategic Strike
skill.description: Enhanced damage when striking the target from behind. The Burglar targets a vital location and deals a significant amount of damage to their target.

skill.name: Keen Strike
skill.description:
A keen edged blade and razor wit can combine to truly potent effect. Burglars can take advantage of the stratagem trick with this keen strike.
<rgb=#ff6600>This skill is enhanced by Trick: Stratagem.</rgb>

skill.name: Jollification
skill.description:
The Burglar takes great joy in wreaking havoc amongst their enemies.
<rgb=#ff6600>This skill is enhanced by Trick: Stratagem.</rgb>

skill.name: Pledge to Rohan
skill.description: Issuing a pledge to the land of Rohan you inspire your war-steed and strengthen your attacks in the process.

skill.name: Pledge to Rohan
skill.description: Issuing a pledge to the land of Rohan you support your war-steed and make yourself less imposing in the process.

skill.name: Invoke the Elements
skill.description: Calling upon etchings representing the elements, the Rune-keeper composes a symbol with disastrous intent.

skill.name: Stagger
skill.description: An attack that impairs the target on a critical hit, or when attacking from behind.

skill.name: Inspirational Verse
skill.description: You focus your energies and etchings toward supporting you and your allies finding inspiration in the verses.

skill.name: Radiant Burst
skill.description:
You hurl a lens toward your target distracting and potentially dismounting them. The glimmering light will attract a murder of crows to hamper the target's movement once the distraction dissipates.
<rgb=#ff6600>This skill cannot be used on a target under the effects of 'Murder of Crows' the movement reducing effect applied by Radiant Burst.</rgb>

skill.description: The initial impact of your weapon is meant to injure your foe, but the true damage is unleashed as you drag your weapon across your foe's flesh.

skill.description: A quick attack that applies a Green gamble to your target, restoring the morale of any attackers.

skill.name: Melody - Stance
skill.description: A neutral stance, Melody is focused on neither healing nor harming, but offers the ability to do both in moderation. Only one Stance may be active at a time.

mount.name: Hobby-horse
mount.sourceDescription: Available as a rare drop from Mara Sandydowns' Sack of Presents during the Yule Festival.
mount.description:
A favourite toy of Rohirrim children.
You may ride it in most towns and cities.

skill.name: Bond of the Lore-master
skill.description: The bond of the Lore-master is strong. With it, allies may benefit from an increased knowledge of beasts and the natural world alike.

skill.name: Burglar's Treat
skill.description:
A Burglar is not always about tricks. Sometimes a treat is in order.
This skill gives you and your allies a temporary buff.

skill.name: Tale of Eorl
skill.description: The Minstrel tells the tale of Eorl and the Eotheod who rode to the aid of Gondor at the Battle of the Field of Celebrant. The tale inspires those who hear it, and increases their ability to help or receive help from their allies.

skill.name: The Last Stand of Helm Hammerhand
skill.description: You sing the song of the ninth King of Rohan and the tale of his last stand inspires those who hear it to fight to the bitter end.

effect.name: The Last Stand of Helm Hammerhand

skill.name: A Warden's Resolve
skill.description: Through a steadfast demeanor and an unshakeable resolve, you inspire your allies to greatness in the face of adversity.

skill.name: Call of the Cavalry

skill.name: Cry Vengeance
skill.description: When an enemy is defeated, you let out a Cry that damages nearby enemies.

skill.name: Command
skill.description: When active, melee attacks strike with such force, enemies are driven away, allowing you to attack from range. Cries will infuriate enemies, forcing them to ride close by, allowing you to execute melee attacks. Use this skill to effectively juggle your melee and ranged attacks.

skill.name: All In
skill.description:
Briefly boost your damage, Evade chance, and Finesse rating to try to finish a fight -- but beware if the enemy survives.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Landing a Killing Blow before All In expires prevents the negative effect</rgb>

skill.name: Cash Out
skill.description:
An attack that consumes Gambles to apply effects based on type.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Consumes Red Gamble for instant damage. Consumes Blue Gamble to stun the target and briefly enter Stealth. Consumes Green Gamble to apply a Heal to the burglar. Cash Out cannot critical hit.</rgb>

skill.name: Pledge of Protection
skill.description: The greatest pledges of protection come from those who are guardians, as their oath to those who need help cannot be broken by word or by action. But no oath can be taken lightly by the one who promises to protect, as compromises and sacrifices are often required by those who serve a higher purpose.

skill.name: Crippling Shot
skill.description:
Seeing your enemy at a distance, you instinctively let loose an arrow, catching your foe off guard.
<rgb=#FF7700>Increases Fervour by 1</rgb>

skill.name: Goading Strike
skill.description: You strike, not necessarily to deal damage, but to goad your foe into attacking you. You will be ready for their next attack and your strategy helps you and your allies deal additional damage.

skill.name: Rolling Thunder
skill.description: Your steed rides towards your enemies like a force of nature, with thunderous hooves and lightning in its eyes. Your target flees from you for a short time.

skill.name: Strength of Champions
skill.description: Known to many as ferocious warriors, your mere presence strengthens your allies

<rgb=#FF0000>Applies a 10s Fear effect to the first enemy who triggers the trap.</rgb>

skill.name: Lay Trap
skill.description: Your skill in combat and experience with trapping allow you to lay snares on the go. You throw down a trap behind you that will last for a short period of time or until triggered by an enemy.

skill.name: Lay Trap
skill.description:
Your skill in combat and experience with trapping allow you to lay snares on the go. You throw down a trap behind you that will last for a short period of time or until triggered by an enemy.
<rgb=#FF0000>Applies a 10s Fear effect to the first enemy who triggers the trap.</rgb>

skill.name: Lay Trap
skill.description: Your skill in combat and experience with trapping allow you to lay snares on the go. You throw down a trap behind you that will last for a short period of time or until triggered by an enemy.

skill.name: Lay Trap
skill.description: Your skill in combat and experience with trapping allow you to lay snares on the go. You throw down a trap behind you that will last for a short period of time or until triggered by an enemy.

skill.name: Eyes of the Hunter
skill.description: The embodiment of a natural-born predator, you are able to share your secrets of the hunt with those around you.

skill.name: Eyes of the Hunter
skill.description: The embodiment of a natural-born predator, you are able to share your secrets of the hunt with those around you.

skill.name: Eyes of the Hunter
skill.description: The embodiment of a natural-born predator, you are able to share your secrets of the hunt with those around you.

skill.name: Superior Evocation
skill.description: Your mastery of runes is unparalleled, allowing you to derive much greater benefit from their use.

skill.name: Knowledge of the Rune-keeper
skill.description: You impart wisdom of the ways of old unto your allies, showing them that knowledge is, in fact, power.

skill.name: Motivation
skill.description: The Captain is able to rally the fellowship and have them prepared to defeat any foe who may get in their way

mount.name: Prized Dale-lands Horse
mount.sourceDescription: Available by completing the Deed: The Road to Erebor.

mount.name: Prized Dale-lands Pony
mount.sourceDescription: Available by completing the Deed: The Road to Erebor.

skill.name: Blood of the Dúnedain
skill.description: Strength of morale has long been a noted feature of the line of Elros. This will restore morale to the Ranger.

skill.name: Righteousness Arrow
skill.description: These arrows will make servants of the Eye burn, fearing as they do the goodness of the Dúnedain.

skill.name: Stealth
skill.description: The Rangers of the North have always been skilled at becoming unseen when they wish to be.

skill.name: Dúnadan's Strike
skill.description: A Ranger is both master of blade and bow. This attack will stun the opponent.

skill.name: Quick Shot
skill.description: The Dúnedain are skilled at quickly loosing arrows at their foes.

skill.name: Quick Stab
skill.description: The Dúnedain have trained at quickly striking their foes with a blade.

skill.name: Wide Sweep
skill.description: A sweeping cut in front of a Dúnadan can strike several foes at once.

skill.name: Merciful Fist
skill.description: This powerful attack is Lothrandir's strongest unarmed strike.

skill.name: For Annúminas!
skill.description: Calenglad's battle-cry brings to mind the city of Annúminas, and lowers the morale of his opponents.

skill.name: Lossoth Strikes
skill.description: Lothrandir has mastered the unarmed fighting style with which the Lossoth wage competitions of strength by the fire during the long dark of the winter months.

skill.name: Grey Courage
skill.description: As the leader of the Grey Company, Halbarad can draw upon his position to inspire himself to great acts of strength, increasing his melee damage.

skill.name: Elweleth's Hairpin
skill.description: Elweleth gave this hairpin to Radanir as a token of her affection. It is both decorative and very, very sharp.

skill.name: Lorniel's Pendant
skill.description: Golodir's daughter Lorniel fell at the gates of Carn Dûm, and he bears her pendant everywhere. Thinking on it increases his melee damage and ferocity.

skill.name: Thoughts of Gwindeth
skill.description: Calenglad brings his memories of the Blue Lady with him wherever he goes, and such thoughts serve to restore his morale when otherwise he would despair.

skill.name: Love of the Shire
skill.description: Halros travelled south with the Grey Company, but his memories of that happy land can restore his morale and restore his Vitality.

skill.name: Make Your Own Luck!
skill.description: Saeradan is unusually lucky, especially for a Dúnedan. This surprising good fortune often reveals itself as a decline in the melee effectiveness of his foes.

skill.name: Destabilizing Strike
skill.description:
You call upon your inner reserve of strength to unnerve your opposition, forcing them to behave as you desire on the field of battle.
<rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Fervour</rgb>

skill.name: Recuperate
skill.description:
A Champion knows when they must leave the din of battle for brief respite, relying on their War-steed for safety.
<rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Fervour</rgb>

skill.name: Discipline: Red Dawn
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Red Dawn</rgb>
The Red Dawn Discipline turns your focus to that of the relentless warrior. Damage is improved and your focus is only to force your enemies to yield on the field of battle.

skill.name: Sundering Blow
skill.description:
A violent attack dealing good damage to a target. Critical strikes cause enhanced effects.
<rgb=#FF7700>Increases Fervour by 1</rgb>

skill.name: Swift Cut
skill.description:
A swift slice against an opponent dealing a little damage up front with a hefty bleed to follow.
<rgb=#FF7700>Increases Fervour by 1</rgb>

skill.name: Horn Blast
skill.description:
The Champion uses his battle-horn to drive fear into the hearts of his enemies and their steeds.
<rgb=#FF7700>Removes all Fervour</rgb>

skill.name: Mounted Strike
skill.description:
A simple passing attack that increases attacking strength when successful.
<rgb=#FF7700>Increases Fervour by 1</rgb>

skill.name: Upper-cut
skill.description: You throw a punch at your enemy.

skill.name: Kick
skill.description: You kick out at your enemy.

skill.name: Strength in Panic
skill.description: You heal quickly while in this state of panic.

skill.name: Aimed Shot -- Red
skill.description: Aim for the red target.

skill.name: Small Fish-Net
skill.description: Throw a small net to catch fish.

skill.name: Aimed Shot -- Green
skill.description: Aim for the green target.

skill.name: Aimed Shot -- Blue
skill.description: Aim for the blue target.

skill.name: Large Fish-Net
skill.description: Throw a large net to catch fish.

skill.name: Medium Fish-Net
skill.description: Throw a medium net to catch fish.

skill.name: Song of Unity
skill.description: The Minstrel sings a song that allows them to instantly reap the benefit of two ballads and unlock their Coda

skill.name: Song of Unity
skill.description: The Minstrel sings a song that allows them to instantly reap the benefit of two ballads and unlock their Coda

skill.name: Song of Unity
skill.description: The Minstrel sings a song that allows them to instantly reap the benefit of two ballads and unlock their Coda

skill.name: Stomp!
skill.description: Núrzum raises his leg and prepares to crush the nearest foe!

skill.name: Power of the Stone
skill.description: Call on the power of the Stone to freeze the land around you!

skill.name: Chilling Sweep
skill.description: A wide sweep that chills and knocks away all who stand against you!

skill.name: Decoy
skill.description: Drops a decoy that draws the attention of nearby foes.

skill.name: Lingering Wound
skill.description: Arrows leave a lingering wound. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

skill.name: The One Trap
skill.description: Places a trap at a target location that deals heavy damage upfront and over time while slowing the enemy's movement speed.

skill.name: Upshot
skill.description: This attack does additional damage for each point of Focus consumed.

skill.name: Trickster
skill.description: Tricks affect many enemies, and different tricks can stack. Your Tricks and Trick Removals deal additional damage for a short time.

skill.name: Stun Dust
skill.description:
Stunning the enemy by blowing dust in its face.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Trickster: Improved Counter Defence
skill.description:
Strike to lower the enemy's defences.
Limit: Trickster will allow this trick to stack.

effect.name: DNT - Flag to allow Trickster Stackable tricks to have the appropriate equiv class for skill checks

skill.name: Trick: Improved Disable
skill.description:
Strike to slow and further avoid the foe's attacks.
Limit: One Trick per target.

effect.name: DNT - Flag to allow Trickster Stackable tricks to have the appropriate equiv class for skill checks

skill.name: Trickster: Disable
skill.description:
Strike to slow the foe's attacks.
Limit: Trickster will allow this trick to stack.

effect.name: DNT - Flag to allow Trickster Stackable tricks to have the appropriate equiv class for skill checks

skill.name: Trickster: Counter Defence
skill.description:
Strike to lower the enemy's defences.
Limit: Trickster will allow this trick to stack.

effect.name: DNT - Flag to allow Trickster Stackable tricks to have the appropriate equiv class for skill checks

skill.name: Trickster: Enrage
skill.description:
Cause the enemy to take more damage.
Limit: Trickster will allow this trick to stack, but will not prevent enemies from ussing ranged attacks.

effect.name: DNT - Flag to allow Trickster Stackable tricks to have the appropriate equiv class for skill checks

skill.name: Trickster: Dust in the Eyes
skill.description:
Blind the enemy, causing them to miss often.
Limit: Trickster will allow this trick to stack.

skill.name: Command Pet
skill.description: You signal towards the enemy, sending your companion off to attack.

skill.name: In the Fray - Stance
skill.description: Adjusts stance to deal with enemies in melee combat. (Only one Stance may be active at a time.)

skill.name: Assailment - Stance
skill.description:
Adjusts stance to attack from afar.
All Spear generating gambits and gambit masteries now generate a Javelin icon.
All spear gambits now require a javelin instead of a spear, and several gambits become ranged.
(Only one Stance may be active at a time.)

skill.name: Recklessness
skill.description: Sacrifice defence in favour of an all-out assault, improving your offence for a short time.

skill.name: Rapid Fire
skill.description: Rapidly draw and fire shots with ease.

skill.name: For the Free Peoples
skill.description:
Consume all of your Advanced Technique to reduce the damage you and your allies take for a brief time.
The potency of this effect increases for each Advanced Technique consumed.

skill.name: Blinding Upshot
skill.description: This attack does additional Light damage for each point of Focus consumed.

skill.name: Barrage of Fire
skill.description: A quick attack that deals more damage each time it is used.

skill.name: Barrage
skill.description: A quick attack that deals more damage each time it is used.

skill.name: Flaming Upshot
skill.description: This attack does additional fire damage for each point of Focus consumed.

skill.name: Barrage of Light
skill.description: A quick attack that deals more damage each time it is used.

skill.name: Barrage of Light 3
skill.description: A quick attack that deals more damage each time it is used.

skill.name: Barrage of Fire 3
skill.description: A quick attack that deals more damage each time it is used.

skill.name: Barrage of Fire 2
skill.description: A quick attack that deals more damage each time it is used.

skill.name: Barrage 2
skill.description: A quick attack that deals more damage each time it is used.

skill.name: Barrage of Light 2
skill.description: A quick attack that deals more damage each time it is used.

skill.name: Barrage 3
skill.description: A quick attack that deals more damage each time it is used.

skill.name: Pinning Shot
skill.description: A short range attack that will briefly root the target.

skill.name: Pinning Shot of Fire
skill.description: A short range attack that will briefly root the target.

skill.name: Pinning Shot of Light
skill.description: A short range attack that will briefly root the target.

mount.name: Teal Fireworks Laden Pony
mount.sourceDescription: Available in the Anniversary Festival for Mithril Coins.

mount.name: Teal Fireworks Laden Horse
mount.sourceDescription: Available in the Anniversary Festival for Mithril Coins.

skill.name: Exsanguinate
skill.description: A powerful attack that leaves the target bleeding.

skill.name: Piercing Trap
skill.description:
Places a snare to slow the enemy and cause damage over time.
Trap remains for 60 seconds after being placed.

skill.name: Set Trap
skill.description:
Places a trap to root the enemy.
Trap remains for 60 seconds after being placed.

skill.name: Return to Lalia's Market
skill.description: This enables you to quickly return to Lalia's Market in Bree-town. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Lightning Strike
skill.description:
Calls lightning to strike the enemy, dealing heavy damage.
<rgb=#2C86FF>This skill can cash-out Burning Embers for bonus damage.</rgb>

skill.name: Diminished Target
skill.description: Attack and weaken the tactical defences of your foe.

skill.name: Fire at Will
skill.description: Briefly enable your allies to deal more damage at range.

mount.name: Lissuin Horse
mount.sourceDescription: Available in the Spring Festival for Mithril Coins.
mount.description: A horse from the Spring Festival.

mount.name: Lissuin Pony
mount.sourceDescription: Available in the Spring Festival for Mithril Coins.
mount.description: A pony from the Spring Festival.

skill.name: Nature's Fury
skill.description: Whirls Frost damage around the enemy, with a chance to deal Lightning damage-over-time.

skill.name: Fury of Blades
skill.description:
Deals AoE damage in front of the Champion.
Damage is increased by 30% per pip consumed.

skill.name: Fury of Blades
skill.description:
Deals AoE damage in front of the Champion.
Damage is increased by 30% per pip consumed.

skill.name: The Ancient Master
skill.description: Mastery of lore enables Fire-lore and Frost-lore to cost no Power.

skill.name: Sic 'em!
skill.description:
You summon a host of companions to swarm your enemies. These creatures are wild, and cannot be controlled.
Summoned companions will last for 20s before de-spawning.

skill.name: Champion's Duel
skill.description:
Duel the enemy, increasing your damage every few seconds.
Debuffs the foe's damage and movement speed.

skill.name: Mighty Roar
skill.description: A mighty roar that damages surrounding opponents, this skill is enabled by taking several hits while Unbreakable is active.

skill.name: Rallying Cry (Defeat)
skill.description: Boosts Morale of nearby Fellows.

skill.name: Ring of Fire
skill.description: An attack leaving a flaming circle upon the ground that enemies fear to enter.

skill.name: Hammer Down
skill.description:
A devastating blow that inflicts increased critical damage, and will stun weakened opponents.
<rgb=#00FFDD>3s Stun when opponents are at low morale.</rgb>

skill.name: Redirect
skill.description:
Strike the enemy and reflect a portion of their damage back at them.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires the use of Retaliation, Breach, Whirling Retaliation or Whirling Breach.</rgb>

skill.name: Juggernaut
skill.description: Blocks all attacks briefly, reflecting some damage back to your enemies.

skill.name: War-chant
skill.description: Shout out to dishearten and impede advancing enemies.

skill.name: Cataclysmic Shout
skill.description:
Deals damage and stuns surrounding enemies.
Applies Guardian debuffs and some bleeds to affected targets.

skill.name: Standard of War
skill.description: Calls forth the Standard of War, dealing damage to enemies while enhancing the attacks of nearby allies.

skill.name: Standard of Honour
skill.description: Calls forth the Standard of Honour, dealing damage to enemies while healing the Morale of nearby allies.

skill.name: Standard of Valour
skill.description: Calls forth the Standard of Valour, dealing damage to enemies while increasing the Morale healed to nearby allies.

skill.name: Strength in Numbers
skill.description: Call out to nearby allies and they respond in turn. You receive a heal-over-time that scales with the number of nearby allies, up to 6.

skill.name: Reform the Lines!
skill.description: Take your place in the front lines to bolster morale and heal the Fellowship. This skill temporarily makes you and your entire Fellowship act as though they are your Shield-brother, allowing everyone to benefit from effects which normally only affect your Shield-brother.

skill.name: Devastating Strike
skill.description: Single-target attack that briefly increases the amount of damage enemies take.

skill.name: Devastating Strike
skill.description: Single-target attack that briefly increases the amount of damage enemies take.

skill.name: Legend of Helm Hammerhand
skill.description:
All Fellows gain a Morale Bubble.
If the bubble is broken, no effect will be gained.
If the bubble expires, it will grant a small fellowship heal.
Bubble strength is 10% of the targets' Max Morale pool before other bonuses apply.

skill.name: Born For Combat
skill.description: Makes a full AoE attack. Usable after being struck by an enemy 10 times.

mount.name: Horse of the Midsummer
mount.sourceDescription: Available during the Farmer's Faire Festival for Mithril Coins.
mount.description: A horse from the Summer Festival.

mount.name: Pony of the Midsummer
mount.sourceDescription: Available during the Farmer's Faire Festival for Mithril Coins.
mount.description: A pony from the Summer Festival.

skill.name: Healer's Strike
skill.description:
A melee attack that increases healing effects on yourself for a short time.
Restores Morale of the Fellowship.

skill.name: Hero's Strike
skill.description:
A melee attack that increases the effects of healing on yourself.
Restores your Morale.

skill.name: Combustion
skill.description:
Targeted fire attack dealing damage to all enemies near the target, dealing +Damage per attunement consumed.
Requires Battle Attunement.

skill.name: Bombastic Inspiration
skill.description:
Places a heal-over-time on an ally. When it expires, the target is healed for a large amount.
Stacks up to 3 times, and expiration heal is increased per stack.

skill.name: Concession and Rebuttal
skill.description:
Grants additional effects to the following skills:
Sustaining Bolt: Restores more Morale Writ of Lightning: Applies max rank of debuff and builds double Battle Attunement Epic Conclusion: Leaves a trailing DoT for a portion of the damage dealt Shocking Words: Becomes AoE and slows targets for 5s after being stunned.
Cannot be cast out of combat.

skill.name: Static Surge
skill.description: A powerful attack that deals lightning damage in front of the Rune-keeper.

skill.name: Fulgurite Rune-stone
skill.description: Places a Rune-stone upon the ground which, after a few seconds, is struck by lightning, damaging and briefly stunning nearby foes.

skill.name: Muster in Forlaw
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to Forlaw in Wildermore.

skill.name: Guide to Forlaw
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Forlaw in Wildermore.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Return to Forlaw
skill.description: Thanks to your friendship with the People of Wildermore, you're able to quickly return to Forlaw in Wildermore This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Small Catapult - Place
skill.description: Create a small catapult.

skill.name: Small Ballista - Place
skill.description: Create a small ballista.

skill.name: Dodge This!
skill.description:
A javelin throw which cannot be avoided.
This skill is only available after an enemy avoids one of your attacks.

skill.name: Massive Chicken Hit
skill.description: One long bomb and the chicken has flown the coop.

skill.name: Rapid Chicken Hit
skill.description: Quick short hits will do the trick.

skill.name: Drink from the Boot
skill.description: A time-honoured tradition. Drink from the boot! Live a little!

skill.name: Hatching
skill.description: A rotten egg in the field is worth more than a henhouse, they say.

skill.name: Sure Strike
skill.description: An attack that cannot be blocked or parried.

skill.name: Sure Strike
skill.description: An attack that cannot be blocked or parried.

skill.name: Improved Sure Strike
skill.description:
An attack that cannot be blocked or parried.
Reduces the active cooldown of Battle-shout.

skill.name: Improved Sure Strike
skill.description:
An attack that cannot be blocked or parried.
Reduces the active cooldown of Battle-shout.

skill.name: Sure Strike
skill.description: An attack that cannot be blocked or parried.

skill.name: Improved Sure Strike
skill.description:
An attack that cannot be blocked or parried.
Reduces the active cooldown of Battle-shout.

skill.name: Smashing Stab
skill.description: After using Shield-swipe or Retaliation, smash the enemy with a shield-blow and weapon strike. If after Shield-swipe: damage and stun. If after Retaliation: damage and bleed. If after both: damage and open a Fellowship Manoeuvre.

skill.name: Juggernaut
skill.description: Blocks all attacks briefly, reflecting some damage back to your enemies.

skill.name: Bastion of Light
skill.description: Your connexion to the Light manifests beneath your feet; marking targets within the light making them susceptible to your debuffs.

skill.name: Gallant Display
skill.description:
An attack that heals the fellowship and wounds enemies in front of you.
This skill heals more but costs more power with each subsequent use.

mount.sourceDescription: Available in the Farmer's Faire Festival for Mithril Coins.
mount.description: A horse from the Farmers Faire.

skill.name: Warning Shot - Fire
skill.description: A powerful toss which aggravates your target, forcing them to attack you.

skill.name: Warning Shot - Light
skill.description: A powerful toss which aggravates your target, forcing them to attack you.

skill.name: Snap Shot - Wages of Fear
skill.description:
Turning your back on a Warden with javelin at hand is likely to be the last thing you do.
This skill deals extra damage when used from behind.

skill.name: Snap Shot - Hampering Javelin of Fire
skill.description: Javelins can pierce body parts or equipment and slow the target until the javelin can be removed.

skill.name: Snap Shot - Improved Hampering Javelin
skill.description:
A precise throw can pin a target to the ground and hinder its movement for a short while thereafter.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Root replaced with a mount acceleration debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Snap Shot - Hampering Javelin
skill.description: Javelins can pierce body parts or equipment and slow the target until the javelin can be removed.

skill.name: Snap Shot - Shield Piercer
skill.description: Special javelins will pierce a defender's shield and bend, making the javelin difficult to remove and the shield nearly useless.

skill.name: Snap Shot - Wages of Fear - Fire
skill.description:
Turning your back on a Warden with javelin at hand is likely to be the last thing you do.
This skill deals extra damage when used from behind.

skill.name: Snap Shot - Improved Hampering Javelin of Light
skill.description:
A precise throw can pin a target to the ground and hinder its movement for a short while thereafter.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Root replaced with a mount acceleration debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Snap Shot - Javelin of Deadly Force
skill.description:
With preparation, some Wardens can throw their Javelins with such deadly force that it will pass completely through several bodies.
For every target hit, you gain a stack of a Ranged Damage and Critical Damage buff.

skill.name: Snap Shot - Stealthed Ambush
skill.description:
When attacking from stealth, a Warden can deliver a powerful opening volley.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Knockout replaced with a mount turn rate debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Snap Shot - Javelin of Deadly Force - Light
skill.description:
With preparation, some Wardens can throw their Javelins with such deadly force that it will pass completely through several bodies.
For every target hit, you gain a stack of a Ranged Damage and Critical Damage buff.

skill.name: Snap Shot - Ambush
skill.description:
When given time to prepare, a Warden can deliver a powerful opening volley.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Knockout replaced with a mount turn rate debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Bucket of Water
skill.description: Splash water on fires to extinguish them.

skill.name: Improved Merciful Shot
skill.description:
A massively damaging shot that unlocks when the target is below 70% health.
Critical hits deal bonus damage.

skill.name: Merciful Shot
skill.description:
A massively damaging shot that unlocks when the target is below 70% health.
Critical hits deal bonus damage.

skill.name: Deadly Decoy
skill.description: Drops an explosive decoy that draws the attention of nearby foes. When it explodes, it will damage and stun enemies.

skill.name: Triple Trap
skill.description:
Places a trap to root the enemy.
Trap remains for 60 seconds after being placed.

skill.name: Triple Trap
skill.description:
Places a trap to root the enemy.
Trap remains for 60 seconds after being placed.

skill.name: Unbreakable
skill.description: The Champion empowers themselves by releasing a mighty cry. Each time they are hit, they grow tougher until eventually letting out a mighty roar, damaging all those around them.

skill.name: Volcanic Rune-stone
skill.description:
Places a Rune-stone upon the ground that deals damage-over-time to nearby enemies.
The Rune-stone will persist for 11s.

skill.name: Our Fates Entwined
skill.description:
This skill buffs the rune-keeper to reduce incoming damage.
Additionally it creates a rune-stone on the battlefield. While it lasts, the Rune-stone: -Redirects 20% of all damage taken by nearby allies to itself. -Provides Mastery buffs to all nearby allies. -Cannot be destroyed.

mount.name: Steed of the Hammerhand
mount.sourceDescription: Not available at this time.

mount.name: Steed of the Hammerhand
mount.sourceDescription: Not available at this time.

skill.name: Demoralizing Shout
skill.description: Your enemies quake, their morale shattered from your pronouncement.

skill.name: Enfeebling Cry
skill.description: Your battle cry slows your enemies, causing them to be uncertain about their next actions.

skill.name: Piercing Roar
skill.description: Your enemies feel sharp pain as you sound the call of battle.

skill.name: Stunning Bellow
skill.description: Your target is stunned at the strength of your battle cry.

skill.name: Empowerment
skill.description: You see your enemy fall before you and are eager for the rest to join him.

skill.name: Rending Bark
skill.description: Your sharp bark catches your enemies by surprise, opening up opportunities to strike.

skill.name: Invigoration
skill.description: You feel as though you could take on the entire army yourself.

skill.name: Serrated
skill.description: Your senses sharpen as you seek out the weaknesses in your enemy's defences.

skill.name: Fleetness
skill.description: You feel as though you could dance through the battlefield.

skill.name: Fortification
skill.description: You steel your resolve and focus on your defences.

skill.name: Eye for an Eye
skill.description: Every strike against you will cause your attackers pain.

skill.name: Rejuvenation
skill.description: Your wounds sting less and your pain ebbs as adrenaline flows through your veins.

skill.name: Entrenchment
skill.description: Your attackers' onslaught finds fewer holes in your defences, reducing the damage you take.

skill.name: Smell the Roses
skill.description: This skill suppresses all mount speed buffs on your character, including those from the Apprentice and Journeyman Riding Skills. Any buff durations suppressed by this skill will continue to run while suppressed.

skill.name: Piercing Roar
skill.description: Your enemies feel sharp pain as you sound the call of battle.

skill.name: Stunning Bellow
skill.description: Your target is stunned at the strength of your battle cry.

skill.name: Rending Bark
skill.description: Your sharp bark catches your enemies by surprise, opening up opportunities to strike.

skill.name: Demoralizing Shout
skill.description: Your enemies quake, their morale shattered from your pronouncement.

skill.name: Enfeebling Cry
skill.description: Your battle cry slows your enemies, causing them to be uncertain about their next actions.

skill.name: Call to Ioreth
skill.description: Invoke the name of the expert Gondorian Healer. Remembrances of her techniques guarantee your next Heal to be a Critical Heal.

skill.name: Sweeping Cut
skill.description: A sweeping back-and forth strike in a frontal arc.

skill.name: Tripwire
skill.description:
A tripwire trap can knock a monster down, sometimes creating the opportunity to use a Fellowship Manoeuvre.
Trap remains for 1 minute after being placed.

skill.name: Tripwire
skill.description:
A tripwire trap can knock a monster down, sometimes creating the opportunity to use a Fellowship Manoeuvre.

skill.name: Exit the Haunted Burrow
skill.description: This enables you to quickly return to the entrance of the Haunted Burrow.

skill.name: Thrust
skill.description:
Deal a thrusting blow to open a Deep Wound.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires the use of Breach, or Whirling Breach.</rgb>

skill.name: Brutal Assault
skill.description: You use brute strength to hammer home a well placed blow. Taking the Haemorrhage Trait will give your attack a chance to cause a bleed.

skill.description: You use brute strength to hammer home a well placed blow. Taking the Haemorrhage Trait will give your attack a chance to cause a bleed.

skill.name: Identify
skill.description: Point out a spotter.

skill.name: Slash
skill.description: A powerful swing that deals damage to your enemy.

skill.name: Biting Edge
skill.description: Two quick and vicious strikes across an enemy.

skill.name: Slam
skill.description: Bring down your weapon with great force upon your foe.

skill.name: Rush
skill.description: You erupt into a sprint, gaining ground quickly on your foes.

skill.name: Hearten
skill.description: Words of encouragement help your allies through dark times.

skill.name: Ferocious Roar
skill.description: Let out a battle cry, causing you to rapidly gain Wrath.

skill.name: Shake Free
skill.description: Allows you to break free of effects that cause you to lose control of your actions.

effect.name: Exits Daze, Fear, Stun, Conjunction Stun, Knockdown and Knockout combat states.

skill.name: Cleanse
skill.description: Your experience in the woods has taught you how to deal with evils that plague your allies.

effect.name: DNT - Remove Poison, Disease, Wound, or Fear

skill.name: Nature's Vengeance
skill.description: Your deep bond with Nature allows you to purge evil powers from even the darkest of hearts.

skill.name: Vigilant Roar
skill.description: You fiercely cry out at an enemy.

skill.name: Grisly Cry
skill.description: Your roar causes even the staunchest enemies to run in fear.

skill.name: Sacrifice
skill.description: In times of need, you are willing to do what it takes to protect your friends.

skill.name: Relentless Maul
skill.description: You rear up and begin to thrash violently, dealing damage to all enemies in front of you.

skill.name: Vicious Claws
skill.description: A savage attack that deals damage to your enemy, interrupting their action. Provides additional effects based on your specialization.

skill.name: Bee Swarm
skill.description: Call forth a swarm of bees to attack your foe.

pet.description: Summons a white swan to brighten your day.

pet.description: Summons a black swan to brighten your day.

skill.name: Lûtkal's Memories
skill.description:
Lûtkal was a master of the sword and shield in life, but they avail him nothing now. Above all else he misses the life he lived with his wife and children, before the coming of Isildur.
<rgb=#FF0000>Lûtkal cannot use the skills he had in life, cursed as he is to an undying existence.</rgb>

effect.name: Memories of a Life Halted and Lost

pet.name: Little Tundra Cub
pet.sourceDescription: Available from participating in community events.
pet.description: Summons a little tundra cub to brighten your day.

pet.name: Spirit Bear
pet.sourceDescription: Available from participating in community events.
pet.description: Summons a spirit bear to brighten your day and be unsettling.

skill.name: Sweeping Riposte
skill.description: Powerful attack that hits multiple enemies in front of you and cannot be blocked, parried, or evaded. This skill requires a parry event.

skill.name: Merciful Strike
skill.description: A powerful attack.

skill.name: Merciful Strike
skill.description: A powerful attack that will always Critically Hit.

pet.sourceDescription: Available in the LOTRO Store.
pet.description: Summons a night swan to brighten your day.

skill.name: Guide to Dol Amroth
skill.description:
Returns you and your Fellowship to Dol Amroth in western Gondor.
This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Muster in Dol Amroth
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to Dol Amroth in western Gondor.

skill.name: Return to Dol Amroth
skill.description: Thanks to your friendship with the Men of Dol Amroth, you're able to quickly return to Dol Amroth in western Gondor. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Piercing Roar
skill.description: Your roar pierces the defences of your enemy, causing it to weaken for a brief moment.

skill.name: Bash
skill.description: A devastating attack with all your might that knocks your target back and leaves them bleeding.

skill.name: Execute
skill.description: A devastating attack against a single enemy. Consumes all your Wrath.

skill.name: Call To Wild
skill.description: Calling upon the beast within, your melee attacks do increased damage for a short period.

skill.name: Expose (Man)
skill.description:
Seeing a weakness in the enemy's defences, you exploit it, increasing your target's vulnerability to damage.
Makes targets more vulnerable to Tactical damage in Man form.

skill.name: Claw Swipe
skill.description:
With your claws out, you swing across a group of enemies, lowering their offences for a brief moment.
This debuff stacks up to 3 times.

skill.name: Counterattack
skill.description: While under the effect of Counter, evading an attack allows you to freely strike your target.

skill.name: Rending Blow
skill.description: You strike your opponent across the face with your paw, interrupting their action.

skill.name: Counter
skill.description: You enter a reactive stance, increasing your ability to dodge attacks for a period of time. If an attack is dodged, you seize that opportunity to counterattack.

skill.name: Recuperate
skill.description: You consume some of your Wrath to regain some Morale in the heat of battle.

skill.name: Guarded Attack
skill.description:
Calculated and precise, your attacks hit their mark while bolstering your defences against any retaliation.
The mitigation buff stacks up to 5 times.

skill.name: Return to Derndingle
skill.description: Thanks to your friendship with the Ents, you are able to quickly return to Derndingle. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Snap Shot - Ambush with Flame
skill.description:
When given time to prepare, a Warden can deliver a powerful opening volley.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Knockout replaced with a mount turn rate debuff</rgb>

skill.name: Snap Shot - Stealthed Ambush with Flame
skill.description:
When attacking from stealth, a Warden can deliver a powerful opening volley.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Knockout replaced with a mount turn rate debuff</rgb>

skill.description: You call on nature to increase the Morale of your ally.

skill.description: A mark that can be placed on an enemy. This mark will interact with various skills, altering or increasing their potency.

skill.name: Takedown
skill.description: Knocks an enemy down for a short duration.

skill.name: Encouraging Roar
skill.description: Consumes a portion of your Wrath to restore a large amount of Morale to your target.

skill.name: Mark of Grimbeorn
skill.description: A mark that can be placed on yourself or an ally. This mark will interact with various skills, altering or increasing their potency.

skill.name: Discipline: Red Dawn
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Red Dawn</rgb>
The Red Dawn Discipline turns your focus to overpowering your foes with devastating attacks.

skill.name: Discipline: Riddermark
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Riddermark</rgb>
The Riddermark Discipline turns your focus to steering the course of battle while maintaining your ability to protect allies from enemy assault.

skill.name: Discipline: Rohirrim
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Rohirrim</rgb>
The Rohirrim Discipline turns your focus to steeling yourself against the enemy's attack, drawing their ire and defending your allies from enemy assaults.

skill.name: Armour Crush
skill.description: You strike your opponent across the face with your paw, increasing the damage they take for a duration.

skill.name: Slash
skill.description: Slash a single target and generate Wrath. Places a stacking bleed on the target.

skill.name: Slash
skill.description: Slash a single target and generate Wrath. Has a chance to place a healing buff on your fellowship.

skill.name: Slash
skill.description: Slash a single target and generate Wrath. Has a chance to place a healing buff on the Beorning.

skill.name: Recuperate
skill.description: Catch your breath and recuperate. Places a heal over time on the Beorning and increases healing for the fellowship.

skill.description: Unleash a mighty roar that generates a large amount of Wrath. Has a chance to restore morale.

skill.name: Bee Swarm
skill.description: Unleashes bees on the target, dealing damage over time. Places a physical mitigation debuff on the target.

Consume remaining Wrath to deal a massive amount of damage. Can not miss or be blocked, parried, or evaded.
Damage is increased by 20% for every 20 Wrath you consume.

skill.description:

skill.description: Unleash a mighty roar that generates a large amount of Wrath. Guarantees your next Beorning mounted skill will crit.

skill.name: Menacing Maul

skill.description: A powerful two strike attack

skill.description: You maul the enemy with your sharp claws. Subsequent attacks deal more damage.

skill.name: Thrash - Tier 2
skill.description: You maul the enemy with your sharp claws. Subsequent attacks deal more damage.

skill.description: Re-directs a portion of the healing you receive to your friend.

skill.name: Rejuvenating Bellow
skill.description: Consumes a portion of Wrath to restore Morale to your target and their fellowship.

pet.name: Sand-flies
pet.sourceDescription: Available for barter in Dor-en-Ernil. Requires Kindred Standing with the Men of Dor-en-Ernil.
pet.description: Summons some sand-flies to your side. They have taken an interest in you.

pet.name: Stowaway Rat
pet.sourceDescription: Available for barter in Lebennin. Requires Kindred Standing with the Men of Lebennin.
pet.description: Summons a stowaway rat to your side. It once lived on a Corsair ship, but now prefers travelling with you!

skill.name: Vicious Claws: Hide
skill.description:
A savage attack that deals damage to your enemy, interrupting their action.
Generates threat.

skill.name: Vicious Claws: Claw
skill.description:
A savage attack that deals damage to your enemy, interrupting their action.
Deals increased damage.

skill.name: Vicious Claws: Roar
skill.description:
A savage attack that deals damage to your enemy, interrupting their action.
Costs less Wrath.

skill.name: Bear-form
skill.description: Beornings can assume the form of a bear in the midst of combat.

skill.name: Grisly Cry
skill.description:
Your roar causes even the staunchest enemies to run in fear.
If specialized in The Roar, fear will apply to all enemies around the target.

skill.name: Instigate
skill.description: You prefer to command the enemies' attention in battle and know how to instigate your opponent, generating threat over time.

skill.name: Positive Thinking
skill.description: Increases the rider's Morale regen in and out of combat while active.

skill.name: Steel Skin
skill.description: Your experience in battle has taught you how to make best use of your armour, which affords you and your steed an increased armour rating.

skill.name: Ride for Ruin
skill.description: You ride for ruin and for victory, greatly increasing your chance to land a critical hit.

skill.name: Trample
skill.description: Your steed is able to barrel over unmounted foes dealing massive damage.

skill.name: Invigourate
skill.description: You nurture your steed back to a battle-ready state, restoring its power over a short period of time.

skill.name: Feign Injury
skill.description: You fake an injury just long enough to divert the enemy's attention elsewhere.

skill.name: Bolstering Cry
skill.description: Crying out, you encourage your steed to continue the fight and restore a moderate amount of its endurance in the process.

skill.name: Sacrifice
skill.description: You are able to put yourself in harm's way and absorb all incoming damage, protecting the steed while active.

skill.name: Dash
skill.description: Your steed pushes itself beyond normal limits, increasing its speed for a short period of time.

skill.name: Dash
skill.description: Your steed pushes itself beyond normal limits, increasing its speed for a short period of time.

skill.name: Claim the Ring
skill.description:
All these troubles could be ended, and the might of Mordor brought low, if only you were to claim the Ring...
<rgb=#FF0000>Requires the temptation of the Ring.</rgb>

skill.name: Determination
skill.description: Samwise Gamgee has come to rescue Frodo, and no Orc or evil shall keep him from his master.

skill.name: Sting
skill.description: When Frodo fell to Shelob's venom, Samwise Gamgee took up Sting. The Orcs of Cirith Ungol shall soon know it well!

skill.name: Phial of Galadriel
skill.description:
When held aloft, the phial of Galadriel's light can overcome even the greatest evils of Mordor.
<rgb=#FF0000>Requires a moment of great need.</rgb>

skill.name: Hobbit-sense
skill.description: Samwise Gamgee may not be strong, or fast, or indeed very smart... But he has plain old hobbit-sense and it serves him well.

skill.name: Return to the Udûn Foothold
skill.description: Thanks to your friendship with the Conquest of Gorgoroth, you're able to quickly return to the Udûn Foothold. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Guide to the Udûn Foothold
skill.description:

This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Muster in the Udûn Foothold
skill.description: Allows the Warden to travel to the Udûn Foothold.

skill.name: Dextrous Hook
skill.description:
A quick hook that generates Mettle.
Dextrous Set-up: If a Dextrous Hook is the most recent Set-up Attack used, the next Mettle Spender will deal 35% additional skill damage.

skill.name: Low Strike
skill.description:
A swift punch that generates Mettle.
Low Set-up: If Low Strike is the most recent Set-up Attack used, the next damaging Mettle-spender will restore a substantial amount of Power.

skill.name: The Best Defence
skill.description: Your will is an overwhelming force driving you and your companions forward to victory.

skill.name: Sinister Cross
skill.description:
A strong punch that generates Mettle.
Sinister Set-up: If a Sinister Cross is the most recent Set-up Attack used, the next Mettle Spender will tier-up any available Innate Strength buffs twice instead of once. If no Innate Strength buffs have been unlocked via Trait Set Bonuses, this has no effect.

skill.name: Helm's Hammer
skill.description:
Calling upon the spirit of Helm Hammerhand, you infuse your blow to admonish the enemy's corruption.
Corruption Removal

skill.name: Shattering Fist
skill.description:
Drive a devastating fist into your enemy's armour, leaving it broken and ineffective.
Reduces target armour

skill.name: Gut Punch
skill.description:
An uncompromising strike to the gut leaves your enemy reeling and unable to effectively defend themselves for a time.
Applies a damage debuff. A given target will be on guard and immune to this debuff for 70 seconds after it wears off.

skill.name: Fulgurant Strike
skill.description:
This strike catches the enemy unawares, leaving them breathless and interrupting complex skills and manoeuvres.
Interrupts

skill.name: Mighty Upheaval
skill.description: You slam your gauntlets into the ground with incredible force, creating a shockwave to damage and possibly knock opponents down.

skill.name: Knee Strike
skill.description: You bring your knee up in a sudden strike.

skill.name: Backhand Clout
skill.description: A wide back-handed smash that may catch multiple enemies with its force.

skill.name: Helm-crusher
skill.description:
A crushing head-butt that can stun an opponent into insensibility.
Stuns

skill.name: Come At Me
skill.description:
Often honing their methods in uncouth tavern brawls, Brawlers are known to challenge all comers - one at a time, or all together.
PBAoE Taunt

skill.name: Ignore Pain
skill.description:
Unwilling to acknowledge even debilitating injuries, Brawlers often focus on developing the willpower to fight through normally insurmountable pain.
Removes Fears, Diseases, Poisons, and Wounds from yourself.

effect.name: DNT - Remove Poison, Disease, Wound, or Fear

skill.name: Joy of Battle - Heal
skill.description:
Few arts require as strong a constitution as the Brawler's method of battle, and they soon come to relish tests of their limits.
For a short duration, any strikes you make will heal the Brawler for a small portion of their Maximum Morale.
Using one 'Joy of Battle' skill will trigger the cooldown for both 'Joy of Battle' skills.

skill.name: Follow Me!
skill.description:
Brawlers have been known to inspire foolhardy acts of bravery in their comrades - mostly by charging headlessly into a fray and dragging their allies along with them against their better judgement.
Move Speed Buff

skill.name: Slip Free
skill.description:
Well versed in the grappler's tricks, Brawlers can quickly slip out of holds, traps, and other attempts to constrain them.
Recover from being dazed, stunned, or knocked down.

effect.name: Exits Daze, Fear, Stun, Conjunction Stun, Knockdown and Knockout combat states.

skill.name: Weather Blows
skill.description:
Enter a temporary state wherein you are nearly unassailable. Nearly.
This effect will not stack with other incoming damage reduction effects.

skill.name: Brash Invitation
skill.description:
Devotees of the Brawler's art are known for their seeming arrogance and flippancy during battle, often using this to drive their opponents into a careless rage.
Single-target ranged taunt

skill.name: Overhand Smash
skill.description: An overhand smash that does impressive damage.

skill.name: Quick Feint
skill.description: A sudden feint leaves your enemy off-balance and grants you the Mettle to quickly finish them.

skill.name: Share Innate Strength: Heavy
skill.description:
Bolster your fellowship and raid members with a portion of your Innate Strength: Heavy. <rgb=#FF0000>Requires a Tier 4 Innate Strength: Heavy buff to be present on the Brawler.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>If Specialized as The Fulcrum, all Fellowship and Raid Members within 15m gain: Increased Physical and Tactical Mitigation
If specialized as The Maelstrom, all Fellowship and Raid Members within 15m gain: Increased Critical Rating</rgb>

skill.name: Share Innate Strength: Balance
skill.description:
Bolster your fellowship and raid members with a portion of your Innate Strength: Balance. <rgb=#FF0000>Requires a Tier 4 Innate Strength: Balance buff to be present on the Brawler.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>If Specialized as The Fulcrum, all Fellowship and Raid Members within 15m gain: Increased Parry Chance
If specialized as The Maelstrom, all Fellowship and Raid Members within 15m gain: Increased Finesse</rgb>

skill.name: Share Innate Strength: Quickness
skill.description:
Bolster your fellowship and raid members with a portion of your Innate Strength: Quickness. <rgb=#FF0000>Requires a Tier 4 Innate Strength: Intimidating Presence or Raw Power buff to be present on the Brawler.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>If Specialized as The Fulcrum, all Fellowship and Raid Members within 15m gain: Decreased Threat Generation
If specialized as The Maelstrom, all Fellowship and Raid Members within 15m gain: Increased Damage</rgb>

skill.name: Discipline: Rohirrim
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Rohirrim</rgb>
The Rohirrim Discipline turns your focus to steeling yourself against the enemy's attack, drawing their ire and defending your allies from enemy assaults.

skill.name: Mocking Taunt
skill.description: Deliver some choice words to your opponent, dealing Light-type damage. Has a chance to restore morale for your fellowship.

skill.name: Mocking Taunt
skill.description: Deliver some choice words to your opponent, dealing Light-type damage. Guarantees your next Brawler mounted skill will crit.

skill.name: Discipline: Red Dawn
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Red Dawn</rgb>
The Red Dawn Discipline turns your focus to overpowering your foes with devastating attacks.

skill.name: Mocking Taunt
skill.description: Deliver some choice words to your opponent, dealing Light-type damage. Has a chance to restore morale.

skill.name: Discipline: Riddermark
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat.
<rgb=#66ffff>Riddermark</rgb>
The Riddermark Discipline turns your focus to steering the course of battle while maintaining your ability to protect allies from enemy assault.

skill.name: Throw
skill.description: Throw a random object at your target, lowering its defences with a stack of Rattled. Rattled can stack up to 3 times.

skill.name: Take a Breath
skill.description: Care for yourself and your comrades. Places a heal over time on the Brawler and increases incoming healing for the fellowship.

skill.name: Reckless Attack

skill.name: Momentous Hit

skill.name: A Murder of Crows
skill.description: You summon a murder of crows to tear apart your enemy, damaging and disorienting them for a time.

skill.name: Share Innate Strength: Quickness
skill.description:
Bolster your fellowship and raid members with a portion of your Innate Strength: Quickness. <rgb=#FF0000>Requires a Tier 4 Innate Strength: Intimidating Presence or Raw Power buff to be present on the Brawler.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>If Specialized as The Fulcrum, all Fellowship and Raid Members within 15m gain: Decreased Threat Generation
If specialized as The Maelstrom, all Fellowship and Raid Members within 15m gain: Increased Damage</rgb>

skill.name: Share Innate Strength: Balance
skill.description:
Bolster your fellowship and raid members with a portion of your Innate Strength: Balance. <rgb=#FF0000>Requires a Tier 4 Innate Strength: Balance buff to be present on the Brawler.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>If Specialized as The Fulcrum, all Fellowship and Raid Members within 15m gain: Increased Parry Chance
If specialized as The Maelstrom, all Fellowship and Raid Members within 15m gain: Increased Finesse</rgb>

skill.name: Share Innate Strength: Heavy
skill.description:
Bolster your fellowship and raid members with a portion of your Innate Strength: Heavy. <rgb=#FF0000>Requires a Tier 4 Innate Strength: Heavy buff to be present on the Brawler.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>If Specialized as The Fulcrum, all Fellowship and Raid Members within 15m gain: Increased Physical and Tactical Mitigation
If specialized as The Maelstrom, all Fellowship and Raid Members within 15m gain: Increased Critical Rating</rgb>

<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 2 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ff00>Your next three Hero's/Herald's/Dissonant Strikes have no cooldown.</rgb>

skill.name: Lesser Anthem I - Resonance
skill.description:
Anthem: Increases your Outgoing Healing and reduces the Induction time of your Healing Skills. Increases Outgoing Healing and reduces Inductions for all nearby fellowship or raid members.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 1 ballad buff present on the Minstrel.</rgb>
<rgb=#00ff00>Makes your next Bolster Courage instant cast. This buff lasts for ten seconds.</rgb>

skill.name: Nature's Vengeance (Dual)
skill.description: Your deep bond with Nature allows you to purge evil powers from even the darkest of hearts.

skill.name: Thunderous Roar (Dual)
skill.description: You fiercely cry out to all enemies around you, daring them to go toe to toe with you.

skill.name: Grisly Cry (Dual)
skill.description: Your roar causes even the staunchest enemies to run in fear.

skill.name: Vicious Claws: Claw (Dual)
skill.description:
A savage attack that deals damage to your enemy, interrupting their action.
Deals increased damage.

skill.name: Bee Swarm (Dual)
skill.description: Call forth a swarm of bees to attack your foe.

skill.name: Vicious Claws: Roar (Dual)
skill.description:
A savage attack that deals damage to your enemy, interrupting their action.
Costs less Wrath.

skill.name: Claw Swipe (Dual)
skill.description:
With your claws out, you swing across a group of enemies, lowering their offences for a brief moment.
This debuff stacks up to 3 times.

skill.name: Grisly Cry (Dual)
skill.description:
Your roar causes even the staunchest enemies to run in fear.
If specialized in the Roar, fear will apply to all enemies around the target.

skill.name: Vigilant Roar (Dual)
skill.description: You fiercely cry out at an enemy.

skill.name: Vicious Claws (Dual)
skill.description: A savage attack that deals damage to your enemy, interrupting their action. Provides additional effects based on your specialization.

skill.name: Takedown (Dual)
skill.description: Knocks an enemy down for a short duration.

skill.name: Armour Crush (Dual)
skill.description: You strike your opponent across the face with your paw, increasing the damage they take for a duration.

skill.name: Rending Blow (Dual)
skill.description: You strike your opponent across the face with your paw, interrupting their action.

skill.name: Vicious Claws: Hide (Dual)
skill.description:
A savage attack that deals damage to your enemy, interrupting their action.
Generates threat.

skill.name: Thrash - Tier 3 (Dual)
skill.description: You maul the enemy with your sharp claws. Subsequent attacks deal more damage.

skill.name: Broad Thrash - Tier 3 (Dual)
skill.description: You maul the enemy with your sharp claws. Subsequent attacks deal more damage.

skill.name: Thrash - Tier 2 (Dual)
skill.description: You maul the enemy with your sharp claws. Subsequent attacks deal more damage.

skill.name: Thrash - Tier 1 (Dual)
skill.description: You maul the enemy with your sharp claws. Subsequent attacks deal more damage.

skill.name: Bash (Dual)

Requires Melody Stance.
Deals AoE Light damage and significantly reduces Light damage resistance.

skill.name: Cleansing Shadows
skill.description: Summon tendrils of shadow, cleansing you of up to three non-physical effects and healing you for each effect consumed.

skill.name: Fungal Bloom
skill.description: Salves of foul herbs and liquids from the depths of Angmar relieve the sting of wounds on the flesh of foul creatures, and increase their ability to inflict wounds.

skill.name: Boon of the Battle-scarred
skill.description: Douse your ally with a foul concoction, corrupting their many scars and reminding them that they need not fear the weapons of the enemy.

skill.name: Herb-tender Stance
skill.description:
You focus on concoctions of foul herbs and fungi to push your allies through their pain.
Only one stance may be active at a time. You can only change stances outside of combat.

skill.name: Boon of the Blackened Heart
skill.description: Throw a gourd of noxious herbs at your ally, hardening their corrupt heart and making them fight with greater fury.

skill.name: Boon of Toxic Flesh
skill.description: You bring out the corrupt nature of your ally's flesh, improving their defences.

skill.name: Doom of the North
skill.description: Remind your foes of the doom of the North Kingdoms, dealing massive frost damage after a brief delay.

skill.name: Curse-shouter Stance
skill.description:
You focus your energy on crippling your opponents' will to fight.
Only one stance may be active at a time. You can only change stances outside of combat.

skill.name: Stinging Spores
skill.description: Spores weave their way into your target, attacking their flesh from within.

skill.name: Ranged Unseen Strikes
skill.description:
A series of impossibly fast attacks strike your opponents.
This skill will consume any War Cry, Brink of Victory, Surety of Death, or Desolation damage over time effects on your targets, dealing bonus damage for each effect consumed.

skill.name: Javelin of Fate
skill.description: A lunge which deals shorter, more potent Light damage over time.

skill.name: Javelin of Fate
skill.description:
A lunge which deals shorter, more potent Light damage over time.
<rgb=#FF7700>Using will restore this skill to Battle Memory.</rgb>

skill.name: Rapid Techniques
skill.description:
In times of need, wardens are able to rapidly speed up their foundational techniques.
The skill will remove your mastery skill cooldowns for 6 seconds while reducing your power costs.

skill.name: The Way of the Spear
skill.description:
Wardens know that the surest path to victory is relying on the basics.
This skill changes to match the type of the last gambit used.
The Way of the Spear will consume all your Advanced Technique to improve your initial hit damage for a brief time.

skill.name: Desperate Fist
skill.description: In a desperate fury, your cry resonates above the din of battle, forcing nearby enemies to focus on you for a brief time.

skill.name: Desperate Spear
skill.description: Channel your desperation into a blur of impossibly fast strikes, dealing significant damage to enemies in front of you.

skill.name: Desperate Combat
skill.description:
In desperate situations, a warden is capable of striking at many opponents before them.
When activated, this skill will enable Desperate Spear, Desperate Shield, or Desperate Fist for 90s, depending on the type of gambit you last used.
This skill will consume all of your Advanced Technique, giving you an additional use of Desperate Spear, Shield, or Fist for each Advanced Technique consumed.

skill.name: Desperate Shield
skill.description: In desperation, strike enemies in front of you with your broad shield, restoring morale for each foe hit.

skill.name: Restorative Shield-work
skill.description: Briefly improve your defences, restoring morale each second if an enemy attack hits you. This effect lasts for 10 seconds or until you heal 5 times.

skill.name: The Way of the Fist
skill.description:
Wardens know that the surest path to victory is relying on the basics.
This skill changes to match the type of the last gambit used.
The Way of the Fist will consume all your Advanced Technique to briefly improve the potency of your damage over time effects.

skill.name: The Way of the Shield
skill.description:
Wardens know that the surest path to victory is relying on the basics.
This skill changes to match the type of the last gambit used.
The Way of the Shield will consume all your Advanced Technique to improve your healing from Shield gambits for a brief time.

skill.name: Call Forba
skill.description: You can use this horn to call Forba to your side.

skill.name: Gallant Display
skill.description:
An attack that wounds enemies in front of you.
This skill deals greater damage but costs more power with each subsequent use.

skill.name: Gallant Display
skill.description:
An attack that wounds enemies in front of you.
This skill deals greater damage but costs more power with each subsequent use.

skill.name: Defensive Strike
skill.description: You attack defensively, entering a Battle-readied state.

skill.name: Stand Alone
skill.description:
Sometimes, a captain is forced to stand alone. When necessary, you are capable of displaying great combat prowess even without an audience.
This skill will prevent the use of Blade-brother while active.

skill.name: Masterful Strike (To Arms)
skill.description: Strike your foe with immense force, increasing your damage greatly for a brief time.

skill.name: Defensive Strike
skill.description: You attack defensively, entering a Battle-readied state.

skill.name: Courageous Heart
skill.description: Improves your defences for a brief time.

skill.name: Cry of Fury
skill.description: Muster your strength and let loose a furious cry, harming and reducing the offence of foes around you, while restoring a large amount of morale over a short period.

skill.name: Inspire: Self-determination
skill.description: A melee attack that increases your defences a small amount and greatly increases your damage.

skill.name: At the Fore
skill.description:
You are the first line of defence, facing down enemies directly and without fear.
While active, you will build stacks of 'At the Fore' when hit by enemies.

skill.name: Hammer-stroke
skill.description: Strike your foe with a powerful melee attack, which you follow up by assuming a defensive posture.

skill.name: Song-brother's Call
skill.description: Momentarily shield an ally.

skill.name: Gift of Spirit
skill.description:
Instantly restores a large amount of morale to you or an ally.
This skill consumes the Inspirited buff when used.

skill.name: Bow of the Righteous
skill.description: Your ranged skills will restore a significant amount of power for a short time.

skill.name: Furious Strikes
skill.description: Your Herald can increase their offence for a short time.

skill.name: Will to Carry On
skill.description: Your Herald stands steadfastly by your side, carrying on even through great hardship.

skill.name: Cutting Strike
skill.description: Your Herald strikes multiple targets in melee range.

skill.name: Valiant Strike
skill.description: A strike that instantly heals the Morale of your Fellowship.

skill.description: Does fixed effect to test buffs and mitigations.

skill.description: Does fixed effect to test buffs and mitigations.

skill.description: Does fixed common damage to test buffs and mitigations.

skill.description: Does fixed effect to test buffs and mitigations.

skill.description: Does fixed effect to test buffs and mitigations.

skill.description: Does fixed effect to test buffs and mitigations.

skill.description: Does fixed common damage to test buffs and mitigations.

skill.description: Does fixed effect to test buffs and mitigations.

skill.description: Does fixed effect to test buffs and mitigations.
