skill.name: Protection by the Shield
skill.description: Fellowship and Raid members near the Guardian receive less damage.

skill.name: Relentless Fury
skill.description: You revel in the fury and the fray, channeling your martial skill and prowess into deadly attacks and accessing your complete arsenal of skills for a short time.

skill.name: Re-centre
skill.description: After using a Finisher skill, recentre yourself and regain your balance.

skill.name: Motivating Song
skill.description:
A simple tune motivate your allies, improving and restoring their morale.
<rgb=#FF7700>This effect does not stack with other sources of Motivate.</rgb>

skill.name: Sail to Celondim
skill.description: Navigate to Celondim with nearby fellows.

skill.name: Sail to the Brown Lands
skill.description: Navigate to the Brown Lands with nearby fellows.

skill.name: Flick
skill.description: With a quick flick of your blade, interrupt your target's focus.

skill.name: Shanty: Steady Fore
skill.description: Gain Fore-ward pips over time.

skill.name: Compound Attack
skill.description:
Press your advantage by continuously striking your target.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay: Lunge applies an additional Bleed.</rgb>

skill.name: Sail to Trader's Wharf
skill.description: Navigate to Trader's Wharf with nearby fellows.

skill.name: En Garde
skill.description:
Refresh your Steady buff and prepare for combat. This skill can only be used while in Steady Balance.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay: Thrust deals more damage. Blade Shield gives more Parry chance.</rgb>

skill.name: Blade Shield
skill.description:
Adopt a defensive stance with your blade, increasing your chance to Parry incoming attacks.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay: Step Back reduces Incoming Damage. Riposte deals more damage.</rgb> <rgb=#ecdd11> Riposte increases your target's Incoming Damage.</rgb>

skill.name: Lunge
skill.description:
Commit your momentum to a forward lunge, dealing damage with an increased chance to critically hit.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay Finisher: Enables Re-centre.</rgb>

skill.name: Sail to after-battle Osgiliath
skill.description: Navigate to after-battle Osgiliath with nearby fellows.

skill.name: Dodge
skill.description:
Avoid your enemy's strikes with a quick leap.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay: Enables the use of Disengage. Disengage further improves your Run Speed. Riposte deals more damage and has improved critical chance.</rgb>

skill.name: Belly of Brine
skill.description: Minor afflictions don't compare to eating only rations for long periods. Your strong stomach allows you to shrug off a single effect.

effect.name: DNT - Remove Poison, Disease, Wound, or Fear
DNT - Remove Poison, Disease, Wound, or Fear

skill.name: Sail to Lake-town
skill.description: Navigate to Lake-town with nearby fellows.

skill.name: Sail to the Mirk-eaves
skill.description: Navigate to the Mirk-eaves with nearby fellows.

skill.name: Sail to Tinnudir
skill.description: Navigate to Tinnudir with nearby fellows.

skill.name: Sea Legs
skill.description: Regain some balance and free yourself from negative combat states.

effect.name: Exits Daze, Fear, Stun, Conjunction Stun, Knockdown and Knockout combat states.

skill.name: Shanty: Steady Aft
skill.description: Gain Aft-ward pips over time.

skill.name: Thrust
skill.description:
A quick forward thrust.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay: Improves Single Target Skill Damage. Aggressive Strike deals more damage. Advance deals more damage.</rgb> <rgb=#FF0000> Advance applies a bleed.</rgb>

skill.name: Step Back
skill.description:
Create space with a step back.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay: Disengage gains a heal. Riposte will enrage your target.</rgb>

skill.name: Salt Cure
skill.description: With a strike of your salted blade, remove a corruption from your foe.

skill.name: Volatile Salts
skill.description: A phial of salts which will explode in a flash when broken.

skill.name: Sail to Dol Amroth
skill.description: Navigate to Dol Amroth with nearby fellows.

skill.name: Feint
skill.description:
Fool your opponent by rapidly stopping your previous movement, allowing you to take a different tack.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay:</rgb><rgb=#FF0000> Dodge restores morale. Cut-over becomes AoE. Compound Attack has increased critical chance.</rgb>

skill.name: Riposte
skill.description:
Shift back into an aggressive posture with a cutting strike.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay: Advance deals more damage. </rgb><rgb=#ecdd11> Advance gains a chance to stun.</rgb> <rgb=#33BCFF> Marked Foes deals more damage.</rgb>

skill.name: Sail to Buckland
skill.description: Navigate to Buckland with nearby fellows.

skill.name: Sail to Pelargir
skill.description: Navigate to Pelargir in King's Gondor with nearby fellows.

skill.name: Sail to Sûri-kylä
skill.description: Navigate to Sûri-kylä with nearby fellows.

skill.name: Advance
skill.description:
Advance on your opponent with two thrusts.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay: Finishers deal increased damage.</rgb> <rgb=#ecdd11> Debilitating Strike disarms your target.</rgb> <rgb=#33BCFF>Dramatic Flourish gives even greater chance to critically hit.</rgb>

skill.name: Sail to Lothlórien
skill.description: Navigate to Lothlórien with nearby fellows.

skill.name: Disengage
skill.description:
Sometimes, the best movement is to survive.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay Finisher: Enables Re-centre.</rgb>

skill.name: Sail to Tharbad
skill.description: Navigate to Tharbad with nearby fellows.

skill.name: Sail to Snowbourn
skill.description: Navigate to Snowbourn with nearby fellows.

skill.name: Cut-over
skill.description:
Make an aggressive cut.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay:</rgb><rgb=#FF0000> Flèche applies latent damage.</rgb>

skill.name: Breath of Fire
skill.description: Breathe spirits through the flame of a torch, setting alight any enemies with the misfortune to be standing before you.

skill.name: Throw Bolas
skill.description: Throw bolas at your target, entangling their legs and those of enemies nearby.

skill.name: Smoking Stones
skill.description: The stones in this phial crackle and vibrate with energy. Exposing them to air will unleash their full potential.

skill.name: Sludge Pot
skill.description: A pot filled with a foul-smelling sludge.

skill.name: Breach
skill.description:
A strong attack that opens an enemy to attack.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Opens a combat response.</rgb>

skill.name: Whirling Breach
skill.description:
A whirling attack that opens enemies to a greater attack
<rgb=#00FFDD>Opens a combat response.</rgb>

skill.name: Bastion of Light
skill.description: Your connexion to the Light manifests beneath your feet; marking targets within the light making them susceptible to your debuffs.

skill.name: Bastion of Light
skill.description: Your connexion to the Light manifests beneath your feet; marking targets within the light making them susceptible to your debuffs.

skill.description: Your connexion to the Light manifests beneath your feet; marking targets within the light making them susceptible to your debuffs.

skill.description: Your connexion to the Light manifests beneath your feet; marking targets within the light making them susceptible to your debuffs.

skill.description: Your connexion to the Light manifests beneath your feet; marking targets within the light making them susceptible to your debuffs.

skill.name: Bastion of Light
skill.description: Your connexion to the Light manifests beneath your feet; marking targets within the light making them susceptible to your debuffs.

skill.name: Pitch Pot
skill.description: A pot filled with boiling pitch.

skill.name: Sweeping Advance
skill.description:
Advance on multiple opponents before you with sweeping cuts.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay: Finishers deal increased damage.</rgb> <rgb=#ecdd11> Debilitating Strike disarms your target.</rgb> <rgb=#33BCFF>Dramatic Flourish gives even greater chance to critically hit.</rgb>

skill.name: Toss a Bottle
skill.description: There's nothing like a refreshing bottle of brew to quickly lift the spirits.

skill.name: Intimidating Challenge
skill.description: Most enemies would rather flee than face your challenge.

skill.name: The South Wind
skill.description: Sing to the South Wind, which helps to quicken the pace of you and your allies.

skill.name: Guided by the Stars
skill.description: Sing a tale of the stars, reminding you and your allies of your direction and purpose.

skill.name: The North Wind
skill.description: Call the North Wind down upon your foes.

skill.name: Check-step
skill.description:
Draw your opponent in with a step back, before quickly making an unexpected strike.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay: Disengage gains a heal. Fore Skills deal greater damage.</rgb>

skill.name: Shanty: Fore with Haste
skill.description: Gain increasing Fore-wards pips and increased Damage every second.

skill.name: Debilitating Strike
skill.description:
Strike at your opponent's weapon, disrupting their motion.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay: Disengage further improves Mitigations.</rgb> <rgb=#ecdd11> Lunge will start a Fellowship Maneuovre.</rgb>

skill.name: Caustic Brew
skill.description: A pot filled with a corrosive substance that burns through armour and hide alike.

skill.name: Flèche
skill.description:
Commit your momentum to a massive lunge, cutting across multiple targets as you dash forward with an increased chance to critically hit.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay Finisher: Enables Re-centre.</rgb>

skill.name: Breath of Ice
skill.description: Breathe a concoction of salt and oil through a torch, causing the very air to freeze and slowing any enemies standing before you.

skill.name: Thrum of the Sea
skill.description: The low thrum of the sea resonates about the ears of your target, pushing and pulling their mind and holding them in a trance-like state.

skill.name: Ragged Knife
skill.description: A chipped and rusted throwing knife.

skill.name: Dramatic Flourish
skill.description:
Make a dramatic and masterful stroke, inspiring your allies to fight with greater precision for a moment.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay Finisher: Enables Re-centre.</rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>This effect does not stack with a Captain's Master of War Critical Hit buff.</rgb>

skill.name: Sludge Pot
skill.description: A pot filled with a foul-smelling sludge.

skill.name: Call the Banners of War
skill.description:
Sing a shanty of the banners of war, rippling in the azure sky and inspiring your allies.
<rgb=#FF7700>This effect does not stack with a Captain's Standard of War Damage buff.</rgb>

skill.name: The Breaking of Thangorodrim
skill.description:
Sing a shanty recalling the breaking of Thangorodrim, a tale of the Elder Days that strikes fear into the hearts of your enemies.
<rgb=#FF7700>This effect does not stack with other potent Incoming Damage effects.</rgb>

effect.name: Echo of the Breaking of Thangorodrim

skill.name: Pitch Pot
skill.description: A pot filled with boiling pitch.

skill.name: Marked Foes
skill.description:
Make a forceful cut across enemies before you, increasing the damage they take from all sources.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay: Aggressive Strike deals more damage. Improves AoE Skill Damage. </rgb>
<rgb=#FF7700>This effect does not stack with a Captain's Telling Mark.</rgb>

skill.name: The West Wind
skill.description:
Sing to West Wind, on which flows the call To Arms, strengthening your allies.
<rgb=#FF7700>This effect does not stack with a Captain's To Arms Damage buff.</rgb>

skill.name: Caustic Brew
skill.description: A pot filled with a corrosive substance that burns through armour and hide alike.

skill.name: Carry Caber - Slow
skill.description: You carry a caber, slowly, showing your strength as a forester.

skill.name: Carry Caber - Fast
skill.description: You carry a caber, quickly, showing your prowess as a forester.

skill.name: Rummage: Scrap of Music
skill.description: A scrap of an ancient tune.

skill.name: Rummage: Button
skill.description: An old button that reminds you of home.

skill.name: Rummage
skill.description:
You never know what forgotten treasures have been left at the bottom of your pockets.
Rummaging in your pocket may turn up different objects.

skill.name: Rummage: Salts
skill.description: A small phial of mysterious salts from distant shores.

skill.name: Rummage: Knife
skill.description: A serrated throwing knife, honed to a razer-sharp edge.

skill.name: Rummage: Stone
skill.description: Wow! A stone!

skill.name: Cut-over
skill.description:
Make an aggressive cut, striking multiple foes.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay:</rgb><rgb=#FF0000> Flèche applies latent damage.</rgb>

skill.name: Salt-sea Blade
skill.description: With a strike of your salted blade, weaken your opponent's armour.

skill.name: Final Strike
skill.description: Consuming all of your Wrath, you put all your energy into one devastating area attack to defeat up to 5 enemies before you.

skill.name: To Your Aid
skill.description: You call on nature to aid an ally and increase the Morale of your target.

skill.name: Blood Prize
skill.description:
Entering a frenzied state, you do increased Bleed and Wrath Builder Damage for a duration.
Builders include Slash, Slam, Biting Edge, Serrated Edge, Thrash and Expose.

skill.name: Final Strike (Dual)
skill.description: Consuming all of your Wrath, you put all your energy into one devastating area attack to defeat up to 5 enemies before you.

skill.name: Nature's Wrath
skill.description: You maul the enemy with a furious attack, gaining Wrath.

skill.name: Nature's Salve
skill.description: Restores Morale to allies in a small area around your target.

skill.name: Hearten (Any Form)
skill.description: Words of encouragement help your allies through dark times.

skill.name: Nature's Wrath (Dual)
skill.description: You maul the enemy with a furious attack, gaining Wrath.

skill.name: Savage Knockdown
skill.description: Consuming all of your Wrath, you put all your energy into a savage attack that damages and knocks down up to 5 enemies before you, allowing your escape.

skill.name: Savage Knockdown (Dual)
skill.description: Consuming all of your Wrath, you put all your energy into a savage attack that damages and knocks down up to 5 enemies before you, allowing your escape.

skill.name: Hurricane
skill.description: You move like a hurricane of claws and teeth, bringing nature's fury to your enemies. For a brief duration, raise your evasion to 100%, enfuriating your foes with each strike they are unable to return.

skill.name: Trample
skill.description: You trample on your foes with your forceful attack.

skill.name: Thorned Armour
skill.description: You call on natural defences to absorb and redirect some of your enemies' attacks back on themselves.

skill.name: Trample (Dual)
skill.description: You trample on your foes with your forceful attack.

skill.name: Ferocious Roar (Any Form)
skill.description: Let out a battle cry, causing you to rapidly gain Wrath.

skill.name: Nature's Mend - Tier 4
skill.description: You call on nature to greatly increase the Morale of your ally.

skill.name: Nature's Mend - Tier 2
skill.description: You call on nature to increase the Morale of your ally.

skill.name: Nature's Mend - Tier 3
skill.description: You call on nature to increase the Morale of your ally.

pet.name: Fire-fox Bandit
pet.sourceDescription: Available through barter during the Farmers Faire Festival.
pet.description: Summons a mischievous fox to accompany you on your journeys.

pet.name: Butterflies
pet.sourceDescription: Acquired from the Superior River Hobbit Bundle.
pet.description: Summons a beautiful kaleidoscope of butterflies to brighten your travels.

pet.name: Fennec Fox
pet.sourceDescription: Available in the Corsairs of Umbar Collector's Edition or Ultimate Fan Bundle.
pet.description: Summons a curious fennec fox to accompany you on your journeys.

mount.name: Steed of the Blazing Firmament
mount.sourceDescription: Available in the Farmers Faire Festival.

mount.name: Steed of the Blazing Firmament
mount.sourceDescription: Available in the Farmers Faire Festival.

mount.name: War-steed: Light
mount.description: The Courser is a lightly armoured War-steed. Fast and agile, the Courser provides the greatest speed and maneuverability on the battlefield, trading Endurance and Armour to retain their nimbleness.

mount.name: War-steed: Heavy
mount.description: The Destrier is a heavily armoured War-steed. Stalwart and imposing, The Destrier is bred for battle. The least agile and slowest of the war-steeds trades speed and maneuverability.

mount.name: War-steed: Medium
mount.description: The Rouncey is a moderately armoured War-steed. The Rouncey provides balance and stability without sacrificing or favouring survivability or manoeuvrability.

skill.name: Warrior's Heart
skill.description: Briefly boosts max Morale.

skill.name: Catch a Breath
skill.description:
You are able to catch your breath to restore morale and power.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a block or parry response.</rgb>.

skill.name: Catch a Breath
skill.description:
You are able to catch your breath to restore morale and power.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a block or parry response.</rgb>.

skill.name: Nature's Wrath
skill.description: You maul the enemy with a furious attack, gaining Wrath.

skill.name: Nature's Wrath (Dual)
skill.description: You maul the enemy with a furious attack, gaining Wrath.

skill.name: Claw Swipe
skill.description:
With your claws out, you swing across a group of enemies, lowering their offences for a brief moment.
This debuff stacks up to 3 times.
Grants Incoming Damage Reduction to your Mark of Grimbeorn target.

skill.name: Return to Lyndelby
skill.description: Return home to Lyndelby in Misthallow. This skill is easily interrupted.

skill.name: Elusive Catch
skill.description: You provide a bonus to your Fellowship's Evasion and Stealthiness.

skill.name: Steady Traveller
skill.description: A life of travel allows you to quickly steady yourself, regardless of your current circumstances.

skill.name: Jugglery Proficiency
skill.description: You've always got extra bits and bobs in your haversack, and you're experienced at mixing them into your other concoctions.

skill.name: Rummage: Button
skill.description: An old button that reminds you of home.

skill.name: Rummage: Salts
skill.description: A small phial of incredibly volatile salts from distant shores.

skill.name: Rummage: Scrap of Music
skill.description: A well-preserved scrap of an ancient tune.

skill.name: Cleansing Spirits
skill.description: Nothing gets you feeling better than a quick swig of some cleansing spirits. Everyone who takes a sip feels refreshed.

skill.name: Draining Strike
skill.description:
Your prowess is unmatched, and your skill with the blade literally drains the Power from your foe.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay Finisher: Enables Re-centre.</rgb> <rgb=#ecdd11> Improves the Enervating Counter effect if present.</rgb>

skill.name: Aggressive Strike
skill.description:
Strike recklessly at your opponent.
<rgb=#FF7700>Swordplay: Finishers are more likely to critically hit. </rgb><rgb=#FF0000>Cut-over deals more damage.</rgb>

mount.name: Elk of the Forest-spirit

skill.name: Quick Strike
skill.description: A quick strike which restores some of your morale.

skill.name: The Field of Celebrant
skill.description: Sing of the Field of Celebrant.

skill.name: Re-steady (mounted)
skill.description: Re-steady yourself, restoring morale and power after using a finisher skill.

skill.name: Discipline: Rohirrim
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat
<rgb=#66ffff>Rohirrim</rgb>
The Rohirrim Discipline focuses on the swashbuckling nature of the Mariner, allowing for larger risks and greater results.

skill.name: Mounted Pitch Pot
skill.description: A pot filled with boiling pitch.

skill.name: Explosive Brew
skill.description: A pot filled with combustible substances and set alight.

skill.name: Waves of Grass
skill.description: Even waves of grass can inspire an uplifting song.

skill.name: Anchored Thrust
skill.description: Anchoring your feet into your stirrups, you make a powerful finishing strike.

skill.name: Quick Strike
skill.description: A quick strike which leaves your foe bleeding.

skill.name: Mounted Sludge Pot
skill.description: A pot filled with a foul-smelling sludge.

skill.name: Precise Blade
skill.description:
A follow up strike that deals more damage and has a greater chance to critically hit.
Enables Anchored Thrust.

skill.name: Quick Strike
skill.description: A quick strike which reduces your foe's fighting prowess.

skill.name: Folca's Last Stand
skill.description: Sing of Folca's Last Stand against the Everholt Boar.

skill.name: Discipline: Red Dawn
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat
<rgb=#66ffff>Red Dawn</rgb>
The Red Dawn discipline allows the Mariner to make his actions more subtle and more dangerous as targets are chosen carefully and with purpose.

skill.name: Wounding Knife
skill.description: Throw a serrated throwing knife, honed to a razer-sharp edge.

skill.name: The Slaying of Scatha

skill.name: Discipline: Riddermark
skill.description:
<rgb=#66fff>Mounted Discipline</rgb>
Mounted Disciplines are used to alter the attitude and tactics used by your War-steed in Mounted Combat
<rgb=#66ffff>Riddermark</rgb>
The Riddermark Discipline focuses on distraction and placing enemies in the way of danger.
